Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Hey, you park your kodo under a harpy nest, you get what you deserve.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Kabal Talonpriest
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Inkmaster Solia had to figure out how to tattoo feathers.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Manic Soulcaster
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: When casting a tournament, you really have to put your soul into it!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Pilfered Power
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal for each friendly minion.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The Hozen don't get paid much, but at least they get to keep any excess mana.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Potion of Polymorph
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, transform it into a 1/1 Sheep.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Tastes like Baaaaananas.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Rat Pack
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a number of 1/1 Rats equal _to this minion's Attack.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: He's gonna do it his way.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Sergeant Sally
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Deathrattle: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "Who is she?  Where did she come from?  We don't even have a police force here in Gadgetzan!!" - Mayor Noggenfogger

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Shadow Rager
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Stealth
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: WE WENT THERE!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Shaku, the Collector
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Stealth. Whenever this attacks, add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Aya even staged an intervention once, but Shaku still insists that he is not a hoarder.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Shaky Zipgunner
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Deathrattle: Give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The Grimy Goons can get you any weapon you want but if you want it to not explode you gotta pay extra.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Small-Time Recruits
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text:
[x]Draw three 1-Cost
minions from your deck.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Now we know why they wear tiny watches.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Street Trickster
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Spell Damage +1
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: His first trick: making your wallet disappear!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Toxic Sewer Ooze
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: When Sergeant Sally shows up unexpectedly, DO NOT FLUSH YOUR MANA CRYSTALS DOWN THE TOILET.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Unlicensed Apothecary
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: After you summon a minion, deal 5 damage to_your hero.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Get the ingredients wrong on ONE healing potion and they take your license. What a world!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Volcanic Potion
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Deal $2 damage to all_minions.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The secret ingredient in Kazakus's award-winning chili recipe.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Wickerflame Burnbristle
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Divine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Wickerflame spent years as a recruit for the Goons, never making the big-time because he always fired his chest-cannon too slowly.  "Hey," he thought, "maybe if I keep my beard lit on fire, I can do this faster."  BOOM, promoted.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Backroom Bouncer
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "WHY ARE YOU IN THE BACK ROOM?  WHO IS WATCHING THE FRONT?!"

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Blastcrystal Potion
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Destroy a minion and one of your Mana Crystals.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: There's a fine line between "potion" and "grenade". Wait. Actually, there's not.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Brass Knuckles
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
give a random minion in
your hand +1/+1.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: For the goon that wants to make a fashion statement.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Call in the Finishers
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Summon four 1/1 Murlocs.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: When you really need a job done… but you don't really care if it gets done right.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Crystalweaver
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Give your Demons +1/+1.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The trick is soaking the crystals in warm milk to soften them up.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Daring Reporter
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Whenever your opponent draws a card, gain +1/+1.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: She's working on a story!  While skydiving!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Dispatch Kodo
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "Crime reported at First Bank of Gadgetzan.  Huge quantities of Jade being carried away by what looks like a bunch of Hozen.  Kodo 77 can you make it over there now?"

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Drakonid Operative
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a copy of a card in your opponent's deck.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: His job is to spy on the Goons and the Jade Lotus, but he's OBVIOUSLY a dragon so it's pretty hard work.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Genzo, the Shark
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Whenever this attacks, both players draw until they have 3 cards.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Infamous in the seedy underground card rooms of Gadgetzan, he got his nickname winning the coveted Shark Plushie in the city's first Hearthstone tournament.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Greater Healing Potion
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Restore #12 Health to a friendly character.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Filled with electrolytes!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Grimy Gadgeteer
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "You look like a Gadgetgun 3000-Mark IV man, am I right?"

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Hozen Healer
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Restore a minion to full Health.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: He didn't go to school for healing, but we keep losing all the good healers to Ratchet, so I guess we'll take him.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Jade Lightning
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Deal $4 damage. Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@Deal $4 damage. Summon a Jade Golem.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Jade Lightning, goooo Jade Lightning!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Jade Spirit
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade_Golem.@Battlecry: Summon a Jade_Golem.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "He's so cute!  I just want to squeeze him, then use him for Jade Golem parts!" - Aya Blackpaw

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Jinyu Waterspeaker
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Battlecry: Restore #6 Health. Overload: (1)
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Waterspeakers can tell the future! So the Jade Lotus employs them to speculate on the Auction House.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Kabal Chemist
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Add a random Potion to your hand.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Sure you could have that Polymorph potion, but wouldn't you rather have this mystery potion?  It could be anything.  Even a Polymorph potion!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Kazakus
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, _create a custom spell.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The mysterious leader of the Kabal is NOT a dragon, and does NOT deal in illegal potions.  Any public statements to the contrary will be met with litigation and Dragonfire Potions.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Kooky Chemist
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: #abs

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Lotus Illusionist
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text:
[x]After this minion attacks
a hero, transform it into a
_random 6-Cost minion.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: If you think her Xavius and Sylvanas cosplay is great, wait till you see her Reno Jackson!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Naga Corsair
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Hook-tails are nice and all but she keeps getting stuck on things.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Seadevil Stinger
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Murloc you play this turn costs _Health instead of Mana.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Pretty harmless unless you're a Seadevil.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Shadow Sensei
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Give a Stealthed minion +2/+2.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: He used to be Aya's tutor, but she fired him for bugging her too much.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Tanaris Hogchopper
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Battlecry: If your opponent's hand is empty, gain Charge.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The Hogchoppers are well-known throughout Kalimdor for being a real, actual group.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Worgen Greaser
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Hair products are 79% of his monthly budget.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Alley Armorsmith
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Taunt Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The rent is cheap and she passes the savings onto YOU!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Bomb Squad
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Please don't explode!  Please don't explode!  Please don't explode!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Burgly Bully
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, add a Coin to your hand.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: He only burgles to pay the bills.  He is really just a bully at heart.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Cryomancer
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, gain +2/+2.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: She loves Frozen. I mean who doesn't?

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Doppelgangster
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Summon 2 copies of this minion.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "Every me, get in here!"

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Finja, the Flying Star
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Stealth Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, summon 2 _Murlocs from your deck.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The last true master of Finjitsu.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Grimestreet Enforcer
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: At the end of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "Sir, you don't have a permit to park your mount here."

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Grook Fu Master
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Windfury
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Grook Fu, the ancient Hozen art of bashing heads with a stick.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Kabal Songstealer
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Battlecry: Silence a minion.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Gadgetzan Writer’s Award goes to the player who writes the most compelling fanfic about why this Arakkoa has a golden frog in his hand!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Knuckles
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text:
After this attacks a
minion, it also hits the enemy hero.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: When confronted with accusations of performance-enhancing bananas, Knuckles replied, "I get my fruit from trees I knock down with my bare hands like everyone else."

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Lotus Agents
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Discover a Druid, Rogue, or Shaman card.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Mostly, they stand around and look cool.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Lotus Assassin
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Stealth. Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain Stealth.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: For 5000g, you can just give the Jade Lotus any name and they will assassinate and/or embarrass them.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Lunar Visions
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Draw 2 cards. Minions drawn cost (2) less.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The true mystery of lunar visions is how there is nothing to watch when there are so many channels.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Piranha Launcher
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
summon a 1/1 Piranha.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: A great improvement over the guppy launcher.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Raza the Chained
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x] Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, your Hero Power costs (0) this game.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "Could you do me a favor and get the keys from Kazakus?"

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Red Mana Wyrm
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: It has double the Attack.  "Go on."  And double the Health.  "Yes??"  And its trigger has twice the effect.  "WHAT???"  And it costs…  Five times more.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Second-Rate Bruiser
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Taunt Costs (2) less if your opponent has at least three minions.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: He'll be a first-rate bruiser once he gets used to his contacts.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Spiked Hogrider
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: If an enemy minion has Taunt, gain_Charge.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Did you know the Hogchoppers compete every year at the Mirage Raceway?  They do.  It's a real group.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Streetwise Investigator
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Enemy minions lose Stealth.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "Hmmmm…  Call it a hunch, but I'm starting to think that there may be some kind of criminal activity going on in Gadgetzan."

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Virmen Sensei
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: There is no carrot.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: White Eyes
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle 'The Storm Guardian' into your deck.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: My life for Aya!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Ancient of Blossoms
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Taunt
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: His new shampoo is really working!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Aya Blackpaw
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. @ Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a Jade Golem.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Though young, Aya took over as the leader of Jade Lotus through her charisma and strategic acumen when her predecessor was accidentally crushed by a jade golem.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Big-Time Racketeer
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6_Ogre.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "It'd be a shame if someone disenchanted those Legendaries."

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Defias Cleaner
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Silence a minion with Deathrattle.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: His house cleaning service is quite thorough.  Not a spot to be found... or any of your stuff!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Dragonfire Potion
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text:
[x]Deal $5 damage to all
minions except Dragons.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: No one was brave enough to fire the dragon in person… so they made the potion do it.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Felfire Potion
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Deal $5 damage to all characters.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Kazakus has a squad of imps bottling Felfire round-the-clock and he *still* can't keep up with demand.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Fight Promoter
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a minion with 6 or more _Health, draw two cards.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "Yeah, I can get you Knuckles.  No, no, he's been clean for *weeks*."

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Jade Behemoth
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@[x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: I think we should talk about the jade elephant in the room.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Kabal Crystal Runner
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Costs (2) less for each Secret you've played this_game.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: "Listen, I can cut you in on a little of this premium mana, but you can't tell my boss."

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Kabal Trafficker
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
add a random Demon
to your hand.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Leatherclad Hogleader
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand, gain Charge.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The Hogchoppers, the terrors of Tanaris, can always be found at one tavern or another in Gadgetzan, refueling for totally real and legit adventures that they go on.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Luckydo Buccaneer
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: If your weapon has at least 3 Attack, gain +4/+4.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: You can't just leave a Luckydo somewhere.  You gotta keep 'em with you!  Especially in Gadgetzan!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Madam Goya
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Swap it with a minion in your deck.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: She has set up her Black Market here in Gadgetzan for one purpose, to make a KILLING when Beanie Babies make their inevitable comeback.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Wind-up Burglebot
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Whenever this attacks a minion and survives, draw_a card.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Don't blame the bot for his crimes...  Blame whoever keeps winding him up!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Wrathion
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Draw cards until you draw one that isn't a Dragon.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Wrathion, son of Deathwing, is a dragon.  Why isn't he tagged as a dragon, you ask?  WHAT, ARE YOU TRYING TO BLOW HIS COVER??

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Abyssal Enforcer
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other characters.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The Kabal print this on every package of illicit Mana Crystals: WARNING - DO NOT PUT WITHIN REACH OF ABYSSALS. THIS IS NOT APPROVED FOR USE BY FLAMING DEMONS OF ANY KIND.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Don Han'Cho
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +5/+5.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: The brilliant mastermind of the Grimy Goons, Han sometimes thinks about ditching the idiot Cho, but that would just tear him apart.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Greater Arcane Missiles
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Shoot three missiles at random enemies that deal $3 damage each.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Wow, and I thought Arcane Missiles was great!

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Grimestreet Protector
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Give adjacent _minions Divine Shield.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Some new asphalt should do the trick.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Inkmaster Solia
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, the next spell you cast this turn costs (0).
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Solia marks the Kabal with intricate tattoos that grant immense power. Also it makes it harder for other gangs to recruit from their numbers. BACK OFF, GOONS.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Jade Chieftain
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. Give it Taunt. @Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem. Give it Taunt.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Krul the Unshackled
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon all _Demons from your hand._
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Mayor Noggenfogger
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: All targets are chosen randomly.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: This flavor text was randomly generated.  If it happens to form words and make sense, that is purely by chance.

Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.name: Kun the Forgotten King
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.text: Choose One - Gain 10 Armor; or Refresh your Mana Crystals.
Mean Streets of Gadgetzan.flavor: Aya siphons a bit of Kun's soul to animate each golem in her Jade army. To his credit, he's being a great sport about it.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Adaptation
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Adapt a friendly minion.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Pray for salvation. If that fails, pray for extra horns or bigger teeth.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Air Elemental
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Makes a mean puff pastry.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Awaken the Makers
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Quest: Summon 7 Deathrattle minions. Reward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Binding Heal
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Restore #5 Health to a minion and your hero.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Crystalline Oracle
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card from your opponent's deck _and add it to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Being made of light has its disadvantages, but at least it's always looking on the bright side.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Emerald Hive Queen
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Your minions cost (2) more.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: She rules the emerald hive at the end of the yellow brick trail.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Emerald Reaver
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to each hero.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Not to be confused with clubbing enthusiast Emerald Raver.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Fire Fly
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Archnemeses: small children with glass jars.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Fire Plume's Heart
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Quest: Play 7 Taunt minions. Reward: Sulfuras.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Flame Geyser
Journey to Un'Goro.text:
Deal $2 damage.
Add a 1/2 Elemental to_your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Glacial Shard
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Ice, ice, baby!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Hallucination
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It's the good kind of hallucination.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Iron Hide
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Gain 5 Armor.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Jeweled Macaw
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Jungle Giants
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Quest: Summon 5 minions with 5 or more Attack. Reward: Barnabus.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Lakkari Sacrifice
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Quest: Discard 6 cards. Reward: Nether Portal.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: They asked, “And what must we give in return?” Gul’dan lowered his hood and answered: “Six… cards…”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Lost in the Jungle
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: George and Karl were never heard from again.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Molten Blade
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a new weapon.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It’s a sword! It’s a knife! It’s a swizzle-stick!
