Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Bingo! Minion DNA!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, cast an Elemental Invocation.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: All that's missing is a little heart.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Primordial Drake
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Before he became a rap artist.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tortollan Primalist
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell_and cast it with random targets.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: I see pizza in my future.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Giant Mastodon
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Still salty about it not being the "Year of the Mastodon."

Journey to Un'Goro.name: King Mosh
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Destroy all damaged minions.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: He's a terror at concerts.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Ozruk
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Gain +5 Health for each Elemental you played last turn.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Between you and me, Ozruk is a bit obsessed with his body.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tyrantus
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Millennia of evolutionary pressures turned his species into the Faerie Dragons we know today.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Ultrasaur
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Evolved the really long neck to spy on its neighbors.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Snowflipper Penguin
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: On land, a group of penguins is called a "waddle."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Acherus Veteran
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: This is my Runeblade. There are many like it but this one is mine.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Animated Berserker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He'd be a lot easier to animate if he would just stand still.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Breath of Sindragosa
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deal $2 damage to a random enemy minion and Freeze it.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Is it cold in here or is it just Sindragosa?

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Deadscale Knight
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Lifesteal
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: His favorite spell is Chum Explosion.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Doomerang
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Throw your weapon at a minion. It deals its damage, then returns to_your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Guaranteed to return your weapon directly to your hand! (Wear gloves. Thick ones.)

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Leeching Poison
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Give your weapon Lifesteal this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: No actual leeches were harmed in the creation of this card.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Play Dead
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's a very literal dog.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Righteous Protector
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Taunt Divine Shield
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Sanguine Reveler
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain_+2/+2.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Have some! This drink is to die for!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Wretched Tiller
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever this minion attacks, deal 2 damage to_the enemy hero.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: If you ever tried to plow permafrost, you’d be wretched, too.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bring It On!
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Gain 10 Armor. Reduce the Cost of minions in your opponent's hand by (2).
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Brrr, it's cold in here. Let's hope she doesn't have an Auctioneer!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Brrrloc
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He may be frozen fish, but he fights fresh!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Cryostasis
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Give a minion +3/+3 and Freeze it.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: We'll thaw you out when we find a cure!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Dark Conviction
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: In his court, Uther is judge, jury, AND executioner…

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Dead Man's Hand
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: I got two pair, Rags and Armorsmiths. What you got?

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Defile
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If any die, cast this again.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: This spell was originally designed to help warlocks clean up their hard drives.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Desperate Stand
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Return this to life with 1 Health."
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: They're grateful for the help, but most minions would prefer not dying in the first place.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Drain Soul
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Lifesteal Deal $3 damage to a minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Druid of the Swarm
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Choose One - Transform into a 1/2 with Poisonous; or a 1/5 with Taunt.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The druid awoke from troubling dreams to find herself transformed into a giant spider.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Fallen Sun Cleric
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1/+1.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's hard to keep a Shattered Sun Cleric down.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Forge of Souls
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Draw 2 weapons from your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Powerful weaponry forged by Bronjahm, the Godfather of Souls.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Gnomeferatu
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Remove the top card of your opponent's deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: She prefers the term "Glampire."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ice Fishing
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Draw 2 Murlocs from your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Glow fish, war fish... blow fish, more fish...

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ice Walker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Your Hero Power also Freezes the target.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Ice Walker you say? He doesn't have feet!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Prince Keleseth
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: If your deck has_no 2-Cost cards, give_all minions in your deck +1/+1.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to buff his brothers.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Roll the Bones
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Draw a card. If it has Deathrattle, cast this again.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Call it: Heads or Tailbone…

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shadow Ascendant
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
give another random
friendly minion +1/+1.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: When you're at the bottom, there's nowhere to ascend, but up.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Spirit Lash
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Lifesteal Deal $1 damage to_all_minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: We've got spirit, yes we do! We've got spirit, stolen from you!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Tainted Zealot
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Divine Shield Spell Damage +1
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The love she shares seems to go nowhere. Now she's lost her Light, tosses and turns, she can't sleep at night...

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Toxic Arrow
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, give it Poisonous.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: What doesn't kill you makes you toxic.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Tuskarr Fisherman
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Spell Damage +1.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: If you bring him 500 fish, he'll give you this sweet Kalu'ak Fishing Pole.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Venomstrike Trap
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a 2/3_Poisonous Cobra.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Snakes on a frozen plain.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Acolyte of Agony
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Lifesteal
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It takes many years of practiced study in order to fully master agony.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bearshark
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Candygram."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Coldwraith
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, draw a card.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's freezing his bones off!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Crypt Lord
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Taunt After you summon a minion, gain +1 Health.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The original fifth beetle!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Deathspeaker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Immune this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It helps to speak really, really loud.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Doomed Apprentice
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Jaina was never good at keeping up apprentices.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Drakkari Defender
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Taunt Overload: (3)
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Sometimes, the best defense is an offensive troll.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Drakkari Enchanter
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Your end of turn effects trigger twice.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Drakkari sorceresses have the irritating habit of repeating themselves at the end of every sentence. Every sentence.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Frozen Clone
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, add two copies of it to_your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Gnash
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Give your hero +3_Attack this turn. Gain 3 Armor.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's rude to gnash with your mouth open.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Happy Ghoul
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Costs (0) if your hero was healed this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: When life gives you snow…

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Howlfiend
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, discard a_random card.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The problem is that he carries those cards in his mouth.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Howling Commander
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine_Shield minion from your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Enlistment in her battalion comes with several pairs of earplugs.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Hyldnir Frostrider
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Freeze your other minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Don't be fooled, that polar bear's the one in charge.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ice Breaker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Destroy any Frozen minion damaged by_this.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: A great way to end a conversation.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Mindbreaker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Hero Powers are disabled.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's a mind breaker, dream taker, ghoul trainer, don't you mess around with him.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Mountainfire Armor
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, gain 6 Armor.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Excuse me. Your mountain is on fire.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Plague Scientist
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Combo: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The excruciating pain means it's working!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Prince Taldaram
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: If your deck has_no 3-Cost cards, transform into a 3/3 copy of a minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to copy others.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shadowblade
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Your hero is Immune this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's tacky to call it "Shadeblade."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shallow Gravedigger
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Deathrattle minion to your_hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's hard to put them six feet under when you're three feet tall.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Simulacrum
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Copy the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's like déjà vu, times two.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Stitched Tracker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's just exercising his right to bear arms.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Treachery
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to_your opponent.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Unwilling Sacrifice
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Val'kyr Soulclaimer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text:
[x]After this minion
survives damage,
summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: My Ghoul friend is back and you're gonna be in trouble.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Vryghoul
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's pronounced VERY GHOUL. Don't let anyone tell you different.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Arfus
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Deathrattle: Add a random Lich King card to your_hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: There must always be a Lick King.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Arrogant Crusader
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: To be honest, he was kind of a jerk even BEFORE he was bitten by that ghoul.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Avalanche
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Freeze a minion and deal $3 damage to adjacent ones.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: One of our more snowbally cards.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Blood Razor
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all_minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: For the close shave that you've always wanted. Caution: Very sharp.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Chillblade Champion
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Charge Lifesteal
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It slices, it dices, it vaporizes! The Chillblade will make a Champion out of even the lowliest gnome.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Corpsetaker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain Taunt if your deck has a Taunt minion. Repeat for Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Windfury.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Her extensive collection of corpses includes one of nearly every type.  She'd love for you to join it.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Deathaxe Punisher
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a random Lifesteal minion in your hand +2/+2.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Don't fear the Arcanite Reaper.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Eternal Servitude
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Summon it.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: What do you mean I don't get overtime pay for this?!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Exploding Bloatbat
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: We've all been there after a night of one-too-many funnel cakes.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ghastly Conjurer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Add a 'Mirror Image' spell to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Wearing purple after the holidays? GHASTLY!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Grave Shambler
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever your weapon is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: I think one of the necromancers got a little carried away.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Grim Necromancer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Skeletons.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: WARNING: Skeletons will NOT explode.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Keening Banshee
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever you play a card, remove the top 3 cards of_your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "What are your strengths?" the interviewer asked. "Well," she replied, "I'm really good at keening."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Light's Sorrow
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +1 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: These sorrows cut deep.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Lilian Voss
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Replace spells in your hand with random spells (from your opponent's class).
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: She doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And she absolutely will not stop... ever, until all necromancers are dead.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Meat Wagon
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck with less Attack than this minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Necromancers call it "Meals on Wheels."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Night Howler
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text:
Whenever this minion takes
damage, gain +2 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Honestly, he howls during the day, too.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Phantom Freebooter
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Gain stats equal to your weapon's.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: There's no such thing as a free boot.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Prince Valanar
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, gain Lifesteal and Taunt.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Three Princes stand before you. This one devours one after another.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Professor Putricide
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: After you play a Secret, put a random Hunter Secret into the battlefield.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Among his more notable inventions: A tentacle-groomer, a plague that would wipe out all life on Azeroth, and a fidget spinner.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Rattling Rascal
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Skeleton. Deathrattle: Summon one for your opponent.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Don't give up, skeleton!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Runeforge Haunter
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: During your turn, your weapon doesn't lose Durability.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Don't worry, he'll keep an eye on that for you.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Saronite Chain Gang
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Desperately needs some alone time.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Strongshell Scavenger
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It isn't "grave robbing" when there's no grave. It's just scavenging…

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ticking Abomination
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Abomination. Emphasis on the second syllable.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Wicked Skeleton
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for_each minion that died_this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's minions like these that give normal, law-abiding skeletons a bad rap.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Blood-Queen Lana'thel
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Lifesteal Has +1 Attack for each card you've discarded this game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: As a young blood-princess she learned the proper way for a lady to curtsy, how to address fellow members of royalty, and how to bite them.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bloodworm
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Lifesteal
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Queen Lana'thel insists on one of these, fried, every morning for breakfast.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bolvar, Fireblood
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses_Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's so hot right now.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bone Baron
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Skeletons to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Oil," "Rail," and "Blubber" were already taken.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Cobalt Scalebane
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +3 Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: You get a sword! And you get a sword! Everybody gets a sword!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Corpse Raiser
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He was just minding his business, farming corpses, when you meddling adventurers came along.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Corpse Widow
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Your Deathrattle cards cost_(2) less.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Her marriage survived death, but it decayed pretty quickly after that.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Death Revenant
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each damaged minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: How's everyone doing? Hurt? Bleeding? Wounded? ... Excellent.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Despicable Dreadlord
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He's deathspicable.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Devour Mind
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Copy 3 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. Seconds, anyone?

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Fatespinner
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Choose a Deathrattle (Secretly) - Deal 3 damage to all minions; or Give them +2/+2.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Her clothing? Pure silk, of course.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Skelemancer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon an 8/8 Skeleton.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: What do you mean there's no such thing as "Skelemancy?" But "Dinomancy" is ok?

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Spectral Pillager
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Combo: Deal 2 damage to a minion for each other card you've played this turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It turns out you CAN take it with you.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Sunborne Val'kyr
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2 Health.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Bring valor to Odyn's halls, Champion!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Thrall, Deathseer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Transform your minions into random ones that cost (2) more.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Do not be afraid. Approach. The dead will sleep… for now."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Tomb Lurker
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random Deathrattle minion that died this game to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: She hangs out in all the tombs, but she rarely posts.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Venomancer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Poisonous
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Eight times the death of regular-mancers.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Voodoo Hexxer
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Taunt Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The Silver Hand recruits shuddered in terror when they saw the dreaded totem of the Hexxer: A tiny little snowman, impaled with pins.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Webweave
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Summon two 1/2 Poisonous Spiders.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: O, what a tangled web we weave, hoping spiders dodge the cleave.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Blackguard
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever your hero is healed, deal that much damage to a random enemy minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Did I ever tell you the story of when I single-handedly took down a 29/29 C'thun?" - Reno Jackson

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bone Drake
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The bone drake brings all the dragons to the yard. He would teach you, but you have no cards.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Deathstalker Rexxar
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "You were too slow, old friend. The hunt began long ago. And now... it will never end."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Embrace Darkness
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text:
[x]Choose an enemy minion.
At the start of your turn,
gain control of it.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Furnacefire Colossus
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Discard all weapons from your hand and gain their stats.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Smelts in his mouth, not in your hand.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Moorabi
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever another minion is Frozen, add a copy of it to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Most disturbing is how Moorabi covers all those frozen minions with flavored syrup.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Necrotic Geist
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Nerubian Unraveler
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Spells cost (2) more.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: He loves a good yarn.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shadow Essence
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Summon a 5/5 copy of_a random minion in_your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Skulking Geist
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Destroy all 1-Cost spells in both hands and decks.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: It's as though a million Jade Idols cried out, and were suddenly silenced.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Spellweaver
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Spell Damage +2
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Spells offer twice the moisture wicking of cotton.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Spreading Plague
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Summon a 1/5 Scarab with Taunt. If your_opponent has more minions, cast this again.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: In the past, plagues were spread by mice or fleas. These days they're spread by elves.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Abominable Bowman
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random friendly Beast that died this game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Frosty the Bowman... was an angry hateful soul... with a fresh hewn bow and a missing nose...

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Archbishop Benedictus
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a copy of_your opponent's deck into your deck.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Nobody expects the Archbishop's Benediction!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bonemare
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 and Taunt.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Attacks her job with unbridled enthusiasm.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Malfurion the Pestilent
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Choose One - Summon 2 Poisonous Spiders; or 2 Scarabs with Taunt.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Cenarius once taught me about the precarious balance between life and death. I have come to understand: there IS no balance. Death always wins."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Glacial Mysteries
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The secret is in the frosting.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Rotface
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]After this minion survives damage, summon a random Legendary minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Daddy! I think I made a Legendary!

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Scourgelord Garrosh
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3_Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "You dare to challenge me? Come! Draw your last breath - and then, you are mine."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Shadowreaper Anduin
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions with 5 or more_Attack.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "I will tell you what Velen never taught me. Whosoever stands before the Light… inevitably casts a shadow."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Sindragosa
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/1 Frozen Champions.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "I recognize your effort but I think your magic still has room for improvement." - Sindragosa after taking a class on giving constructive feedback.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: The Lich King
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, add a random Lich King card to your hand.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "All that I am: anger, cruelty, vengeance, 8 attack - I bestow upon you, my chosen knight."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Frost Lich Jaina
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 3/6 Water Elemental. Your Elementals have Lifesteal this game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Arthas was a spoiled child, playing with toys he could neither control nor understand. Come into the cold. I will show you the true power of the Frozen Throne."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Hadronox
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Deathrattle: Summon your Taunt minions that died this game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The viziers of Azjol-Nerub released Hadronox as a last-ditch effort to hold back the Lich King. They did so by VERY carefully scooping him up in a LARGE newspaper and releasing him.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Obsidian Statue
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Uther of the Ebon Blade
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/3 Lifesteal weapon.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Step forward. Confess! Once I was a mere servant of the Light. Now I alone stand in judgement."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Valeera the Hollow
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Run away. Hide in your precious keeps, behind your walls and your bodyguards. Night always falls, and shadows will fill your hallowed halls. One day, one of those shadows will be me."

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Bloodreaver Gul'dan
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly Demons that_died_this_game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: "Still you refuse to bend your knee? None can escape death, you old fool. And in death… all will serve me…"

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Ultimate Infestation
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text:
[x]Deal $5 damage. Draw
5 cards. Gain 5 Armor.
Summon a 5/5 Ghoul.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: Ghouls in the pipe, five by five.

Knights of the Frozen Throne.name: Snowfury Giant
Knights of the Frozen Throne.text: Costs (1) less for each Mana Crystal you've Overloaded this game.
Knights of the Frozen Throne.flavor: This minion goes all the way to 11!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Shifting Scroll
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random Mage spell.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Next turn, this is going to be AMAZING.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Arcane Artificer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Armor equal to its_Cost.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Ethereal armor dissipates in 6 hours which can cause extreme awkwardness for first time buyers.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Barkskin
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Give a minion +3 Health. Gain 3 Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Make like a tree… and gain armor.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Candleshot
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Once called Cahn’delar, Shortbow of the Ancient Whisker.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dark Pact
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Destroy a friendly minion. Restore #8 Health to your hero.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "Don't worry about the fine print. Just sign here."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dire Mole
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: You especially don't want to make a dire mountain out of a dire mole hill.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Feral Gibberer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After this minion attacks a hero, add a copy of it to_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: It's certainly not civilized gibbering.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Gravelsnout Knight
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for_your opponent.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The mole of La Mancha rides again!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kingsbane
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Always keeps enchantments. Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: But it has a soft spot for emperors.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Librarian
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Deal 2 damage to your_hero.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Kobolds sort books using a gooey decimal system.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. @(Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
In ancient woods, elves fought the curse
The demon’s shadow to disperse
But hatred raged and frail souls turned
Now horned and hooved their forests burned.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Psionic Probe
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Copy a spell in your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: She prefers calling it "Psionic Tickling."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Unstable Evolution
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Echo Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: They grow up so fast.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Wax Elemental
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Divine Shield
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Takes double damage from wick-based weapons.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Bladed Gauntlet
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Has Attack equal to your Armor. Can't attack heroes.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: CAUTION: DO NOT SCRATCH NOSE.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Cavern Shinyfinder
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon from your deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: They call her the candled vandal.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Cheat Death
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand. It costs (2) less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Reported.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Crushing Hand
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deal $8 damage to a minion. Overload: (3)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Shamans always have the firmest handshakes.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Drygulch Jailor
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Add 3 Silver_Hand Recruits to_your_hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Hard time: 6-10 turns for candle-nappin'.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Drywhisker Armorer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, gain 2 Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Kobolds use anything for armor: Pots, pans, garbage cans… even other kobolds.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Evasion
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Secret: After your hero takes damage, become Immune this turn.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Works on weapons, missiles, and taxes.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Hermit
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Choose a basic Totem. Summon it.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: To truly understand candles, it takes YEARS of quiet contemplation.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Pearl Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon a 2/2 Spirit with Taunt. @(Restore 3 Health to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
In ages old, when Ancients broke
Azari of the Legion spoke
To tempt the mortals: gems of power
 The weak succumbed, their souls devoured.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Ruby Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Add 1 random Mage spell to your hand. @(Play 2 Elementals to_upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
The final stone undid its master
Spun into wards by nameless caster
Azari wailed a savage roar
Now sealed in nether, evermore.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Murmuring Elemental
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Your next Battlecry this turn triggers_twice.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Déjà Dude.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Plated Beetle
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Gain 3 Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "Ok, your party has defeated the beetle." "I put it on my head." "What?" "I put it on my head. Like a hat."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Potion of Heroism
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Give a minion Divine_Shield. Draw a card.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Also known as "Liquid Courage."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Raven Familiar
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Reveal a spell in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Quoth the raven, 'Does yours cost more?'

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Scorp-o-matic
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 1 or less Attack.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Back in my day, we had to manually scorp.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Sudden Betrayal
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, instead it attacks one of_its neighbors.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: You thought he was your bro-bold, but turns out he's your foe-bold.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Vulgar Homunculus
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Fortunately he has an even number of fingers.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Wandering Monster
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, summon a 3-Cost minion as the new target.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Not all who wander are lost. This one is lost though, for sure.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Benevolent Djinn
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, restore #3 Health to your_hero.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Wish #1: funnel cakes. Wish #2: funnel cakes. Wish #3: FUNNEL CAKES.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Boisterous Bard
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions +1 Health.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: As a kid, she fought with rocks.  Now she fights with ROCK!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Cave Hydra
Kobolds & Catacombs.text:
Also damages the minions next to whomever
this attacks.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Can be upgraded into a Cave Lurker.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dragon Soul
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After you cast 3 spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Dragon.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Crafted by Deathwing's goblin horde, but the dragon added the rainbow sparkles himself.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dragonslayer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to a Dragon.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: A pair of stout dwarves nearly averted the Cataclysm.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Explosive Runes
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Fungal Enchanter
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Qualifications: Born with pointy hat.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Gilded Gargoyle
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: You hear a coin rattling inside the slotted gargoyle...What could it mean?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Greedy Sprite
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Sparkliest of the seven deadly sprites.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Healing Rain
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Restore #12 Health randomly split among all friendly characters.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: It's filled with electrolytes!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Apprentice
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all_enemies.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Horrible secret: The Darkness is immune to Arcane Missiles.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Barbarian
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the start of your turn, attack a random enemy.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: What is best in life? To make candle. To keep candle. To hear lamentations of candle-takers.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lone Champion
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: He is a champion, with no friends. He'll keep on fighting, til the end!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Primal Talismans
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random basic Totem."
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: All that remained from the first kobold colony: a single talisman and the word "Flamestrike."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Reckless Flurry
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Rummaging Kobold
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Return one of your destroyed weapons to your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "Broken longsword is brand new shortsword." - Kobold Proverb

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Sewer Crawler
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/3_Giant Rat.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: His clothing is "ratty" in more ways than one.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Shrieking Shroom
Kobolds & Catacombs.text:
At the end of your turn, summon a random
1-Cost minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Auditioning for the next Fungal Idol.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Sonya Shadowdancer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After a friendly minion dies, add a 1/1 copy of it to your hand. It costs (1).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like a 1/1 is watching.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Stoneskin Basilisk
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Divine Shield Poisonous
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: He got that way from looking into a mirror.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Toothy Chest
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 4.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Do you want to eat an adventurer?  I want to eat an adventurer!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Twilight Acolyte
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, swap this minion's Attack with another minion's.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The dragons mostly keep him around as a snack.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Twilight's Call
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Unidentified Elixir
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Unidentified Maul
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Void Ripper
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of all_other_minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: You had to put the portable hole inside the bag of holding, didn't you?!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Zola the Gorgon
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Her name seems a bit cheesy.
Kobolds & Catacombs.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 23 Kobolds and Catacombs Legendary cards.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Astral Tiger
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a copy of this minion into_your_deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Astral kitty litter is surprisingly hard to find.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Branching Paths
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Choose Twice - Draw a card; Give your minions +1 Attack; Gain 6 Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
Three paths diverged in a darkened hall, and I –
I took the one less traveled by,
And got eaten by a slime.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Call to Arms
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Recruit 3 minions that cost (2) or less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: More personal than a text to arms.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Cursed Disciple
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/1 Revenant.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Politer than his brother, the cursing disciple, but far more evil.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Duskbreaker
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Waking up at the break of dusk is just not as impressive.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Ebon Dragonsmith
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random weapon in your hand by (2).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Having a furnace-mouth is really handy for a blacksmith.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Elven Minstrel
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Combo: Draw 2 minions from your deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Fal'dorei Strider
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your deck. When drawn, summon a 4/4 Spider.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: What’s worse? Seeing the spider, or NOT seeing the spider, but knowing it’s somewhere in your deck?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Flanking Strike
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon a 3/3 Wolf.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Wolves to the left and arrows to the right, here I am stuck in the middle with you.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Hoarding Dragon
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Give your opponent two Coins.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Keeps his two cents to himself.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Hooked Reaver
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or_less Health, gain +3/+3_and Taunt.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The hook is just an accessory. He can reave just fine without it.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Ironwood Golem
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Can only attack if you have 3 or more Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Marketed as a "rust-proof iron golem."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Monk
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero_Powers.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: There is no candle.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
A purple stone Azari carved
For dark hearts, craving, power-starved.
The first to bow, the warlock Rin,
Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Leyline Manipulator
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards that didn't start in your deck, reduce their Cost by (2).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The shortest distance between two points is a leyline.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Oaken Summons
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Gain 6 Armor. Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Shimmering Courser
Kobolds & Catacombs.text:
Only you can target
this with spells and
Hero Powers.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: A courser is a courser of course, of course, she's more of a unicorn than a horse...

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Shroom Brewer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Restore #4_Health.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Side effects guaranteed!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Sneaky Devil
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Stealth Your other minions have +1 Attack.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The result of a tragic accident involving a Defias Thug, a Wand of Polymorph, and a bundle of Fel Lotus.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: The Darkness
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Starts Dormant. Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Candles into the enemy deck. When drawn, this awakens.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: I would rather light a single candle than curse the darkness. But I'm willing to do both.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Twig of the World Tree
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Refresh your Mana Crystals.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: For druids who want to branch out.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Arcane Tyrant
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Tyrant is such a strong word.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Carnivorous Cube
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of it.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: He's always grumpy until he's eaten his first barista of the morning.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Cataclysm
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Destroy all minions. Discard 2 cards.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Corrosive Sludge
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The result of centuries of terrible sanitation.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Deck of Wonders
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "Pick a card, any card. Wait! No! Not that one!" - Last words of previous owner

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dragon's Fury
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all_minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Fungalmancer
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2/+2.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Fungalmancy is the easy major for those who can't cut it at Waxmancy.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Furbolg Mossbinder
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a 6/6_Elemental.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Behold, the unstoppable power of MOSS!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Green Jelly
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/2 Ooze with_Taunt.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: This card really breaks out of the mold.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Guild Recruiter
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The original telemarketer.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Ixlid, Fungal Lord
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After you play a minion, summon a copy of it.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: We suggest crafting Ixlid; he'll grow on you. Literally.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kobold Illusionist
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 copy of a minion from your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: He can make ANYTHING look like a candle.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon two 3/3_Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
An emerald stone for Tauren hands
Who sought its strength to save their lands
Their tribes now lost, their rage released
Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Onyx Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Destroy 1 random enemy minion. @(Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
The trolls of old embraced the gift
A jewel of black for daggers swift
No party lasts who finds the stone
Those wielding it soon stand alone.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Level Up!
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and_Taunt.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
Ding!

Grats.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Skull of the Man'ari
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Don't trust the skull.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Trogg Gloomeater
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Poisonous
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Windshear Stormcaller
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If you control all 4 basic Totems, summon Al'Akir_the_Windlord.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Don't ever doubt Al'Akir's love for basic totems.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Aluneth
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, draw 3 cards.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER…itty bitty living space.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Crystal Lion
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Divine Shield Costs (1) less for each Silver Hand Recruit you control.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Standard issue recruit gear: 1 silver sword, 1 Lordaeron insignia, 2 bags of crystal kibble.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Gather Your Party
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Recruit a minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Thrilling adventure! Danger guaranteed! Loot uncertain! Death optional!  Who’s with me?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Gemstudded Golem
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Can only attack if you have 5 or more Armor.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Perfectly accessorized to attract adventurers.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Grumble, Worldshaker
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Return your other minions to your hand. They cost (1).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The grumbling grew to a mighty rumbling, and out of the caverns the kobolds came tumbling.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Hungry Ettin
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion for your opponent.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: How can he be hungry… if he's Ettin!?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Possessed Lackey
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Recruit a_Demon.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Rin, the First Disciple
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Add 'The First Seal' to your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Signed and sealed, she delivers oblivion.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Seeping Oozeling
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle of a random minion in your deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Uh, you might want to get that looked at.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Spiteful Summoner
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Battlecry: Reveal a spell from your deck. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Sometimes she'll summon a Doomsayer. Out of spite.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: To My Side!
Kobolds & Catacombs.text:
[x]Summon an Animal
Companion, or 2 if your
deck has no minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: I hunt alone.  Well, me and Misha.  And Huffer.  And Leokk.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Unidentified Shield
Kobolds & Catacombs.text:
Gain 5 Armor.
Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Val'anyr
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Corridor Creeper
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Costs (1) less whenever a minion dies while this is_in_your hand.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: It likes the smell of dead things, which is curious, as it has no visible nose.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Crushing Walls
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Destroy your opponent's left and right-most minions.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: "It could be worse!" "It's worse."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. @(Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
A diamond, white, this stone the eighth
A precious jewel for those of faith
A whispered prayer restores the lost
But none among them know the cost.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
To dwarves of stone the demon called
With promises of might, enthralled
In grasping greed they found their doom
Forever bound in mithril tombs.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lesser Sapphire Spellstone
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Summon 1 copy of a friendly minion. @(Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor:
A stone of blue, embraced with glee
By murloc lords beneath the sea
Soon numberless they swarmed the shore
First two, then four, then more...and more...

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Lynessa Sunsorrow
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Battlecry: Cast each spell you cast on your minions this game on this one.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: A diet of pure magic is great for the complexion but wreaks havoc on one's mood.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Psychic Scream
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Everybody! Hit the deck!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Rhok'delar
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no minions, fill your_hand with Hunter_spells.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Rhok'delar is ready to Rhok'de'casbah!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Silver Vanguard
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Recruit an 8-Cost minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Float like a Faerie Dragon, sting like a Hivequeen.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Temporus
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Geosculptor Yip
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, summon a random minion with_Cost_equal_to_your Armor (up to 10).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Once crafted a gauntlet out of earwax and pure ambition.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Grand Archivist
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, cast a spell from your deck (targets chosen randomly).
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Qualifications: Found pointy hat.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Grizzled Guardian
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Recruit 2_minions that cost (4)_or_less.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Favorite sandwich? Grizzled cheese.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Kathrena Winterwisp
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Recruit a Beast.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: She’s not one of those treehugger elves – but she does like the occasional cuddle.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: King Togwaggle
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Battlecry: Swap decks with your opponent. Give them a Ransom spell to swap back.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Management of the Kobold Empire requires a careful balance between a lack of social services and fiscal irresponsibility.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Marin the Fox
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/8 Treasure Chest for your opponent. (Break it for awesome loot!)
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: My name is Marin the Fox. You took my treasure. Prepare to die.
Kobolds & Catacombs.howToGet: Unlocked by opening a Kobolds & Catacombs pack.
Kobolds & Catacombs.howToGetGold: Unlocked with the BlizzCon 2017 virtual ticket.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: The Runespear
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spell and cast it with random targets.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Violet Wurm
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Deathrattle: Summon seven 1/1 Grubs.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: It's wurms all the way down.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Woecleaver
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: After your hero attacks, Recruit a minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Turn that frown into TWO frowns!

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dragoncaller Alanna
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Dragon for each spell you cast this game that costs (5) or more.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Her secret is using a gentle voice and carrying a baggie of hotdogs.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Dragonhatcher
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: At the end of your turn, Recruit a Dragon.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Which came first?  The dragon or the dragonhatcher?

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Master Oakheart
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Battlecry: Recruit a 1, 2, and 3-Attack minion.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: His adventuring party consists of Goldshire Footman, Frostwolf Grunt and Hadronox.

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Sleepy Dragon
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: Taunt
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

Kobolds & Catacombs.name: Voidlord
Kobolds & Catacombs.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon three 1/3 Demons with Taunt.
Kobolds & Catacombs.flavor: Never let it hold your checkbook.

The Witchwood.name: Zap!
The Witchwood.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
The Witchwood.flavor: The material components for this spell are wool socks and a rug.

The Witchwood.name: Blazing Invocation
The Witchwood.text: Discover a Battlecry minion.
The Witchwood.flavor: A lot of shaman have started vaping their invocations.

The Witchwood.name: Chameleos
The Witchwood.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a card your opponent is holding.
The Witchwood.flavor: He's everyone you want to be.

The Witchwood.name: Dark Possession
The Witchwood.text: Deal $2 damage to a friendly character. Discover a Demon.
The Witchwood.flavor: Wanted on three counts of gnomish possession.

The Witchwood.name: Hidden Wisdom
The Witchwood.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, draw 2 cards.
The Witchwood.flavor: Find your own wisdom. Perhaps behind the couch.

The Witchwood.name: Snap Freeze
The Witchwood.text: Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, destroy it.
The Witchwood.flavor: Lick the ice block. I triple-double-dog-dare-you.

The Witchwood.name: Swamp Dragon Egg
The Witchwood.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Would you eat them in a ditch? Would you eat them with a witch?

The Witchwood.name: Swamp Leech
The Witchwood.text: Lifesteal
The Witchwood.flavor: A face only a druid could love.

The Witchwood.name: Town Crier
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
The Witchwood.flavor: When he was younger, he was the town crybaby.

The Witchwood.name: Witch's Apprentice
The Witchwood.text: Taunt Battlecry: Add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Is she a frog that became a witch, or a witch that became a frog?

The Witchwood.name: Witchwood Apple
The Witchwood.text: Add two 2/2 Treants to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: An apple a day keeps the worgen at bay.

The Witchwood.name: Witchwood Imp
The Witchwood.text: [x]Stealth Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +2 Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: This wood imp. Stop asking!

The Witchwood.name: Archmage Arugal
The Witchwood.text: Whenever you draw a minion, add a copy of it to_your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: His worgen children call him Archmage AROO-OO-OO-OO-gal.

The Witchwood.name: Baleful Banker
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.
The Witchwood.flavor: He's gotten big into crypt-o-currency.

The Witchwood.name: Book of Specters
The Witchwood.text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any spells drawn.
The Witchwood.flavor: Known throughout the land as the Spooky-nomicon.

The Witchwood.name: Cathedral Gargoyle
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
The Witchwood.flavor: Fly like an eagle, drop like a rock.

The Witchwood.name: Cheap Shot
The Witchwood.text: Echo Deal $2 damage to a_minion.
The Witchwood.flavor: 50% off. Every shot must go!

The Witchwood.name: Curse of Weakness
The Witchwood.text: Echo Give all enemy minions -2_Attack until your next_turn.
The Witchwood.flavor: Warlocks refer to this as a "balance change."

The Witchwood.name: Divine Hymn
The Witchwood.text: Restore #6 Health to all friendly characters.
The Witchwood.flavor: Taken up an octave, it's highly effective against stained glass golems.

The Witchwood.name: Earthen Might
The Witchwood.text:
[x]Give a minion +2/+2.
If it's an Elemental, add
a random Elemental
to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Or it might not.

The Witchwood.name: Ghost Light Angler
The Witchwood.text: Echo
The Witchwood.flavor: BoOooOogrglgrlgrlooOoOoo!

The Witchwood.name: Hunting Mastiff
The Witchwood.text: Echo Rush
The Witchwood.flavor: "Shh! You're going to start a howl!"

The Witchwood.name: Lost Spirit
The Witchwood.text: Deathrattle: Give your minions +1 Attack.
The Witchwood.flavor: She simply refuses to ask for directions.

The Witchwood.name: Pick Pocket
The Witchwood.text: Echo Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
The Witchwood.flavor: He'll pick anyone's pocket, except a gnome's. He'd never stoop so low.

The Witchwood.name: Rat Trap
The Witchwood.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 6/6 Rat.
The Witchwood.flavor: MISSING: One giant rat. Please return to King Togwaggle.

The Witchwood.name: Rebuke
The Witchwood.text: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
The Witchwood.flavor: When one buke just isn’t enough.

The Witchwood.name: Redband Wasp
The Witchwood.text: Rush Has +3 Attack while damaged.
The Witchwood.flavor: Also comes in other colors, but red's in fashion this season.

The Witchwood.name: Sound the Bells!
The Witchwood.text: Echo Give a minion +1/+2.
The Witchwood.flavor: Weirdly, the bells stop ringing after 5.

The Witchwood.name: Spellshifter
The Witchwood.text: [x]Spell Damage +1 Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: He also goes by "worg-lock."

The Witchwood.name: Squashling
The Witchwood.text: [x]Echo Battlecry: Restore #2 Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: Everyone hail to the squashling song!

The Witchwood.name: Vicious Scalehide
The Witchwood.text: Lifesteal Rush
The Witchwood.flavor: They make wonderful pets if you're not allergic to blood loss.

The Witchwood.name: Warpath
The Witchwood.text: Echo Deal $1 damage to all_minions.
The Witchwood.flavor: "Left, right, left, right, there's none of the enemy left… Right?"

The Witchwood.name: Woodcutter's Axe
The Witchwood.text: Deathrattle: Give +2/+1 to a random friendly minion.
The Witchwood.flavor: It's a lumberjack's axe and that's ok.

The Witchwood.name: Blackwald Pixie
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Refresh your Hero Power.
The Witchwood.flavor: "Oh hi bark."

The Witchwood.name: Blink Fox
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
The Witchwood.flavor: It's like, SUPER bad at staring contests.

The Witchwood.name: Cinderstorm
The Witchwood.text: Deal $5 damage randomly split among all enemies.
The Witchwood.flavor: Forecast: "Cloudy with a chance of fireballs."

The Witchwood.name: Cutthroat Buccaneer
The Witchwood.text: Combo: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
The Witchwood.flavor: In life he worked as a sword swallower.

The Witchwood.name: Druid of the Scythe
The Witchwood.flavor: She's a scythe for sore eyes.

The Witchwood.name: Duskbat
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, summon two 1/1 Bats.
The Witchwood.flavor: Happily married with two kids. It was love at first bite.

The Witchwood.name: Duskhaven Hunter
The Witchwood.text: [x]Stealth Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: After a short paws, she's back to herself again.

The Witchwood.name: Face Collector
The Witchwood.text: Echo Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: “I’ll trade you a Malfurion for an Anduin.”

The Witchwood.name: Ferocious Howl
The Witchwood.text:
Draw a card.
Gain 1 Armor for each card in your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Have you ever heard the wolf cry to the blue corn moon?

The Witchwood.name: Fiendish Circle
The Witchwood.text: [x]Summon four 1/1 Imps.
The Witchwood.flavor: Like a knitting circle, but less evil.

The Witchwood.name: Hench-Clan Thug
The Witchwood.text: After your hero attacks, give this minion +1/+1.
The Witchwood.flavor: Hard time making ends meet? Hate the League of Explorers? Get a job henching!

The Witchwood.name: Marsh Drake
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Poisonous Drakeslayer for your opponent.
The Witchwood.flavor: She would have gotten away with it, if it weren't for that meddling Drakeslayer.

The Witchwood.name: Nightmare Amalgam
The Witchwood.text: This has all minion types.
The Witchwood.flavor: Be all that you can be.

The Witchwood.name: Paragon of Light
The Witchwood.text: While this minion has 3 or more Attack, it has Taunt and Lifesteal.
The Witchwood.flavor: She’s all fun and games until someone rings that stupid bell.

The Witchwood.name: Phantom Militia
The Witchwood.text: Echo Taunt
The Witchwood.flavor: Recruited from the Gilnean opera house.

The Witchwood.name: Pumpkin Peasant
The Witchwood.text: [x]Lifesteal Each turn this is in your hand, swap its Attack and Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: Time to squash your opponent.

The Witchwood.name: Rabid Worgen
The Witchwood.text: Rush
The Witchwood.flavor: "I'm sorry, son.  We had to send Old Howler off…to a farm…to play…"

The Witchwood.name: Ratcatcher
The Witchwood.text: Rush Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain its Attack and Health.
The Witchwood.flavor: He's on the hunt for Togwaggle's missing rat.

The Witchwood.name: Ravencaller
The Witchwood.text: [x]Battlecry: Add two random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: That Friends and Familiars Plan is really paying off!

The Witchwood.name: Tanglefur Mystic
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Add a random 2-Cost minion to each player's hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Doom!  Only doom for you!  But pay good tip, maybe less doom.

The Witchwood.name: Vivid Nightmare
The Witchwood.text:
[x]Choose a friendly minion.
Summon a copy of it with
1 Health remaining.
The Witchwood.flavor: "I… I dreamed I accidentally crafted a golden Millhouse! It was so REAL!"

The Witchwood.name: Voodoo Doll
The Witchwood.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Deathrattle: Destroy the chosen minion.
The Witchwood.flavor: "Aww, I love it! It even kinda looks like me."

The Witchwood.name: Walnut Sprite
The Witchwood.text: Echo
The Witchwood.flavor: How do you make a walnut laugh? Crack it up!

The Witchwood.name: Witch's Cauldron
The Witchwood.text: After a friendly minion dies, add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
The Witchwood.flavor: Eye of murloc, ear of bat, foot of Fordring, fur of cat…

The Witchwood.name: Witching Hour

Rise of Shadows.text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: This is CLEARLY their first rodeo.

Rise of Shadows.name: Keeper Stalladris
Rise of Shadows.text: After you cast a Choose One spell, add copies of both choices_to_your_hand.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Keeps your choices handy.

Rise of Shadows.name: Khadgar
Rise of Shadows.text: Your cards that summon minions summon twice_as_many.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: "What do you call two minions summoned at once? Twinions, haha! Wait... where are you going?"

Rise of Shadows.name: Lightforged Blessing
Rise of Shadows.text: Twinspell Give a friendly minion Lifesteal.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Some might call this a lightforgery.

Rise of Shadows.name: Magic Dart Frog
Rise of Shadows.text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: There's a powerful throat in this frog.

Rise of Shadows.name: Mana Cyclone
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell you've cast this turn, add a random Mage spell to your hand.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: It'll put a good spin on your spells.

Rise of Shadows.name: Mana Reservoir
Rise of Shadows.text: Spell Damage +1
Rise of Shadows.flavor: If it soaks too long, it becomes a reservoir hog.

Rise of Shadows.name: Mysterious Blade
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1 Attack.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: It knows every secret you have left.

Rise of Shadows.name: Plot Twist
Rise of Shadows.text:
Shuffle your hand
into your deck.
Draw that many cards.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: It’s coming from inside the deck!

Rise of Shadows.name: Rapid Fire
Rise of Shadows.text: Twinspell Deal $2 damage.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Pew! Pew!

Rise of Shadows.name: Shadowy Figure
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Transform into a_2/2 copy of a friendly Deathrattle minion.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Terrible at shadow puppets: “This is… a tentacle! And this is… two tentacles!”

Rise of Shadows.name: Soul of the Murloc
Rise of Shadows.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc."
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Previously thought nonexistent.

Rise of Shadows.name: Spellbook Binder
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, draw a card.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: You're bound to love his work!

Rise of Shadows.name: Sunreaver Spy
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: She's watching. Always watching.

Rise of Shadows.name: Sweeping Strikes
Rise of Shadows.text: Give a minion "Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks."
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Infinitely preferable to mopping strikes.

Rise of Shadows.name: Underbelly Angler
Rise of Shadows.text: After you play a Murloc, add a random Murloc to your hand.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Attracts murlocs… and moths.

Rise of Shadows.name: Underbelly Fence
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a card from another class, _gain +1/+1 and Rush.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: She’ll take anything you have—except scruples and a good work ethic.

Rise of Shadows.name: Vicious Scraphound
Rise of Shadows.text:
Whenever this minion
deals damage, gain that much Armor.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: It begs for scraps.

Rise of Shadows.name: Witch's Brew
Rise of Shadows.text: Restore #4 Health. Repeatable this turn.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: The swill has eyes!

Rise of Shadows.name: Zayle, Shadow Cloak
Rise of Shadows.text: You start the game with one of Zayle's EVIL Decks!
Rise of Shadows.flavor: E.V.I.L. is the new black.
Rise of Shadows.howToGetGold: Unlocked by owning all The Dalaran Heist chapters.

Rise of Shadows.name: Arcane Watcher
Rise of Shadows.text: Can't attack unless you have Spell Damage.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Now his watch has ended… until you have Spell Damage.

Rise of Shadows.name: Blessing of the Ancients
Rise of Shadows.text: Twinspell Give your minions +1/+1.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Arguably the cutest blessing.

Rise of Shadows.name: Bronze Herald
Rise of Shadows.text: Deathrattle: Add two 4/4 Dragons to your hand.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: This is why you shouldn’t shoot the messenger.

Rise of Shadows.name: Call to Adventure
Rise of Shadows.text: Draw the lowest Cost minion from your deck. Give it +2/+2.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Even the smallest minion can change the outcome of the game.

Rise of Shadows.name: Clockwork Goblin
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: They always wind up bombing.

Rise of Shadows.name: Commander Rhyssa
Rise of Shadows.text: Your Secrets trigger twice.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Two people can keep a secret as long as neither of them are Commander Rhyssa.

Rise of Shadows.name: Conjurer's Calling
Rise of Shadows.text: Twinspell Destroy a minion. Summon 2 minions of the same Cost to replace it.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: If only you’d let it go to voicemail…

Rise of Shadows.name: EVIL Miscreant
Rise of Shadows.text: Combo: Add two random Lackeys to your hand.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Because there are no G.O.O.D. Miscreants.

Rise of Shadows.name: Faceless Rager
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Health.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: When you need to rage anonymously.

Rise of Shadows.name: Flight Master
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Gryphon for each player.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Your gryphon will be summoned following a brief safety demonstration.

Rise of Shadows.name: Hench-Clan Sneak
Rise of Shadows.text: Stealth
Rise of Shadows.flavor: He’d be a lot sneakier if he wasn’t trailing 300 yards of power cable…

Rise of Shadows.name: Impferno
Rise of Shadows.text: Give your Demons +1 Attack. Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Imps don't get mad when you set them on fire. They think it's cozy.

Rise of Shadows.name: Lifeweaver
Rise of Shadows.text: Whenever you restore Health, add a random Druid spell to your hand.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Lifeweaving is all well and good until it's time to cut the thread.

Rise of Shadows.name: Madame Lazul
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a copy of a card in your opponent's hand.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Of course she knows the future, she’s been looking at your cards the WHOLE TIME!

Rise of Shadows.name: Magic Carpet
Rise of Shadows.text: After you play a 1-Cost minion, give it +1 Attack and Rush.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Its small yet fierce riders are affectionately known as rug rats.

Rise of Shadows.name: Messenger Raven
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Discover a Mage minion.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: You can make a collect CAW!

Rise of Shadows.name: Nine Lives
