Rise of Shadows.text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Also trigger its Deathrattle.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Beware the night of the living pets!

Rise of Shadows.name: Rafaam's Scheme
Rise of Shadows.text: Summon @ 1/1 |4(Imp, Imps). (Upgrades each turn!)
Rise of Shadows.flavor: "When your first plan fails... imp-rovise."

Rise of Shadows.name: Spellward Jeweler
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Battlecry: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers until your next turn.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: The fanciest possible way of distracting enemies with shiny things.

Rise of Shadows.name: Ursatron
Rise of Shadows.text: Deathrattle: Draw a Mech from your deck.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: It's been programmed to include all the bear necessities.

Rise of Shadows.name: Arcane Fletcher
Rise of Shadows.text:
[x]Whenever you play a
1-Cost minion, draw a
spell from your deck.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Stop trying to make fletch happen. It's not going to happen.

Rise of Shadows.name: Archmage Vargoth
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]At the end of your turn, cast a spell you've cast this turn (targets are random).
Rise of Shadows.flavor: He's an archmage, but he might want to brush up on the basics... like aiming.

Rise of Shadows.name: Dr. Boom's Scheme
Rise of Shadows.text: Gain @ Armor. (Upgrades each turn!)
Rise of Shadows.flavor:
“We did it! We blew up the vault!”
“You mean the vault door?”
“Oh. The doooor…”

Rise of Shadows.name: Eager Underling
Rise of Shadows.text: Deathrattle: Give two random friendly minions +2/+2.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Eager to please, even if it kills him.

Rise of Shadows.name: Hecklebot
Rise of Shadows.text: Taunt Battlecry: Your opponent summons a minion from their deck.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Built by goblins, designed by a troll.

Rise of Shadows.name: Hench-Clan Burglar
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: She’s more of a rat burglar.

Rise of Shadows.name: Hench-Clan Hag
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Amalgams with all minion types.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: The Hench Clan is an equal opportunity employer, no matter which parts of you came from where.

Rise of Shadows.name: Hench-Clan Shadequill
Rise of Shadows.text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: The Hench-Clan has a point.

Rise of Shadows.name: Kirin Tor Tricaster
Rise of Shadows.text: Spell Damage +3 Your spells cost (1) more.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: The math checks out!

Rise of Shadows.name: Marked Shot
Rise of Shadows.text: Deal $4 damage to_a_minion. Discover_a_spell.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Obviously it's marked for greatness.

Rise of Shadows.name: Omega Devastator
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, deal 10 damage to a minion.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: The Alpha Devastator didn’t devastate enough. The Beta Devastator devastated too much. But the Omega was just right!

Rise of Shadows.name: Portal Keeper
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: No longer allowed to be “it” when playing demon tag.

Rise of Shadows.name: Proud Defender
Rise of Shadows.text: Taunt Has +2 Attack while you [x]have no other minions.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: It'll take a humble offender to defeat him.

Rise of Shadows.name: Scargil
Rise of Shadows.text: Your Murlocs cost (1).
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Wanna know how he got those scars? So does he.

Rise of Shadows.name: Soldier of Fortune
Rise of Shadows.text: Whenever this minion attacks, give your opponent a Coin.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: His allies call him invaluable.

Rise of Shadows.name: Traveling Healer
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Divine Shield Battlecry: Restore #3 Health.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Some heroes have soft hearts and hard shells.

Rise of Shadows.name: Unsleeping Soul
Rise of Shadows.text: Silence a friendly minion, then summon a copy of it.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: It's 3 am. Do you know where your soul is?

Rise of Shadows.name: Vendetta
Rise of Shadows.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you're holding a card from another class.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: A vengeful and vicarious vanguard against violent villains or vexed victims.

Rise of Shadows.name: Violet Spellsword
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each spell in your hand.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: If you have to wield a spell and a sword, then neither is performing to expectation.

Rise of Shadows.name: Waggle Pick
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Kobolds informally refer to its effect as a deathwaggle.

Rise of Shadows.name: Wrenchcalibur
Rise of Shadows.text: After your hero attacks, shuffle a Bomb into your [x]opponent's deck.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Whoso pulleth out this wrench from the toolbox is rightwise king of the lab.

Rise of Shadows.name: Azerite Elemental
Rise of Shadows.text: At the start of your turn, gain Spell Damage +2.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: This is some bad blood.

Rise of Shadows.name: Barista Lynchen
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each of your other Battlecry minions_to_your_hand.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: "Thanks a latte!"

Rise of Shadows.name: Convincing Infiltrator
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: It’s always nice to steal a familiar face.

Rise of Shadows.name: Crystal Stag
Rise of Shadows.text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've restored 5 Health this game, summon a copy of this.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Arrives alone, but usually leaves with a friend just like him.

Rise of Shadows.name: Dalaran Crusader
Rise of Shadows.text: Divine Shield
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Stops for nothing—except donuts.

Rise of Shadows.name: Dragon Speaker
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Give all Dragons in your hand +3/+3.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: All of his speeches really drag on.

Rise of Shadows.name: Duel!
Rise of Shadows.text:
Summon a minion from each player's deck.
They fight!
Rise of Shadows.flavor: If you don’t fight to the death, it’s Duel Yielding.

Rise of Shadows.name: Hagatha's Scheme
Rise of Shadows.text: Deal $@ damage to all minions. (Upgrades each turn!)
Rise of Shadows.flavor:
"All shall suffer!"
"But Hagatha, those are your minions..."
"I said ALL!!!"

Rise of Shadows.name: Hunting Party
Rise of Shadows.text: Copy all Beasts in your_hand.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Not sure I’d call it a good party if everyone ends up beside themselves.

Rise of Shadows.name: Muckmorpher
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform into a 4/4 copy of a different minion in your deck.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Fan favorite in the muck morphin' sewer strangers.

Rise of Shadows.name: Recurring Villain
Rise of Shadows.text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 4 or more Attack, resummon it.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Mwahahaha! You'll never catch him this time!

Rise of Shadows.name: Sunreaver Warmage
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, deal 4 damage.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: What, did you expect the Sunreavers to be coldages?

Rise of Shadows.name: Aranasi Broodmother
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Taunt When you draw this, restore #4 Health to your hero.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: She's got a big brood and a big mood.

Rise of Shadows.name: Darkest Hour
Rise of Shadows.text: Destroy all friendly minions. For each one, summon a random minion from your deck.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: It's always darkest just before you find the light switch.

Rise of Shadows.name: Eccentric Scribe
Rise of Shadows.text: Deathrattle: Summon four 1/1 Vengeful Scrolls.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Them’s fightin’ words!

Rise of Shadows.name: Heistbaron Togwaggle
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: If you control a_Lackey, choose a fantastic treasure.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: A staunch ally of Rafaam, at least while the shinies keep flowing.

Rise of Shadows.name: Mad Summoner
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Battlecry: Fill each player's board with 1/1 Imps.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Does he summon because of his madness, or is he mad from all the summoning?

Rise of Shadows.name: Oblivitron
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a Mech from your hand and trigger its Deathrattle.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Reduce, reuse, re-rattle!

Rise of Shadows.name: Portal Overfiend
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: It’s like an interdimensional game of demon tag.

Rise of Shadows.name: Safeguard
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 0/5 Vault Safe with Taunt.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Keep it secret. Keep it safeguarded!

Rise of Shadows.name: Unidentified Contract
Rise of Shadows.text: Destroy a minion. Gains a bonus effect in_your hand.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: The terms of service are constantly changing.

Rise of Shadows.name: Unleash the Beast
Rise of Shadows.text: Twinspell Summon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: The Kirin Tor have always been lax in enforcing leash laws.

Rise of Shadows.name: Unseen Saboteur
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Your opponent casts a random spell from their hand (targets chosen randomly).
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Far more effective than the flamboyant saboteur.

Rise of Shadows.name: Violet Warden
Rise of Shadows.text: Taunt Spell Damage +1
Rise of Shadows.flavor: He's got magic, a shield, and an unwavering obsession with the color purple.

Rise of Shadows.name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
Rise of Shadows.text: Taunt Battlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

Rise of Shadows.name: Blastmaster Boom
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots for each Bomb in your opponent's deck.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: He's gonna fly through the air with the greatest of grease.

Rise of Shadows.name: Catrina Muerte
Rise of Shadows.text: At the end of your turn, resurrect another friendly Undead minion.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: She always manages to lift your spirits.

Rise of Shadows.name: Chef Nomi
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, summon six 6/6 Greasefire_Elementals.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: His cooking is always very well done.

Rise of Shadows.name: Exotic Mountseller
Rise of Shadows.text:
Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random
3-Cost Beast.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: *Taps roof of mammoth* “You can fit so many squirrels in this thing!”

Rise of Shadows.name: Swampqueen Hagatha
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a 5/5 Horror to your hand. Teach it two Shaman spells.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Rafaam mainly enjoys working with Hagatha because she never laughs at Dr. Boom's jokes.

Rise of Shadows.name: Tak Nozwhisker
Rise of Shadows.text:
[x]Whenever you shuffle a
card into your deck, add
a copy to your hand.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: "One for me and one for future me!"

Rise of Shadows.name: Tunnel Blaster
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: And you always thought they wore the candles just for fun.

Rise of Shadows.name: Underbelly Ooze
Rise of Shadows.text: After this minion survives damage, summon a copy_of it.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: It's always accepting of the less successful adventurers.

Rise of Shadows.name: Vereesa Windrunner
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Equip Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Good things come in threes: Windrunner sisters and arrows of Thori'dal.

Rise of Shadows.name: Archivist Elysiana
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Discover 5 cards. Replace your deck with 2_copies of each.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Your deck is just another organizational challenge to her.

Rise of Shadows.name: Batterhead
Rise of Shadows.text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may_attack again.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: When it comes to problem-solving, he always uses his head.

Rise of Shadows.name: Fel Lord Betrug
Rise of Shadows.text: [x]Whenever you draw a minion, summon a copy with Rush that dies at end of turn.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Nobody else likes rush hour.

Rise of Shadows.name: Heroic Innkeeper
Rise of Shadows.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other friendly minion.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: We reserve the right to refuse service to any 1/1.

Rise of Shadows.name: Jepetto Joybuzz
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Draw 2 minions from your deck. Set their Attack, Health, and Cost to 1.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: “I’m a real toy now!”

Rise of Shadows.name: Lucentbark
Rise of Shadows.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Restore 5 Health to awaken this minion.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Always feels refreshed after a little dirt nap.

Rise of Shadows.name: Power of Creation
Rise of Shadows.text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon two copies of it.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Mostly used for party tricks, to be honest.

Rise of Shadows.name: The Forest's Aid
Rise of Shadows.text: Twinspell Summon five 2/2 Treants.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Delicious Forest’s Aid! Made from real forests.

Rise of Shadows.name: Walking Fountain
Rise of Shadows.text: Lifesteal, Rush, Windfury
Rise of Shadows.flavor: The weirdest part is that it doesn't have legs.

Rise of Shadows.name: Whirlwind Tempest
Rise of Shadows.text: Your minions with Windfury have Mega-Windfury.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: And your minions with mega-windfury get... dizzy.

Rise of Shadows.name: Burly Shovelfist
Rise of Shadows.text: Rush
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Shovel beats paper and rock!

Rise of Shadows.name: Kalecgos
Rise of Shadows.text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

Rise of Shadows.name: Mass Resurrection
Rise of Shadows.text:
Summon 3 friendly minions that died
this game.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: One's company, two's a crowd, and three's a “mass” resurrection, apparently.

Rise of Shadows.name: Big Bad Archmage
Rise of Shadows.text:
At the end of your turn, summon a random
6-Cost minion.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: "My, my, what big minions I have!"

Rise of Shadows.name: Dimensional Ripper
Rise of Shadows.text: Summon 2 copies of a minion in your deck.
Rise of Shadows.flavor:
The first dimensional ripper had a point.
The second fell flat.
The THIRD one really started to take shape!

Rise of Shadows.name: Jumbo Imp
Rise of Shadows.text: Costs (1) less whenever a friendly Demon dies while this is in your hand.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: Jumbo in size! Huge in E.V.I.L.!

Rise of Shadows.name: Nozari
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Restore both heroes to full Health.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: In another timeline, she was called Yeszari.

Rise of Shadows.name: The Boom Reaver
Rise of Shadows.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of a minion in your deck. Give it Rush.
Rise of Shadows.flavor: “What’s better than reaving? BOOM reaving!”

Saviors of Uldum.name: Totemic Surge
Saviors of Uldum.text: Give your Totems +2_Attack.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: It's not really advanced shamanic magic, you just draw nasty eyebrows on them.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Activate the Obelisk
Saviors of Uldum.text: Quest: Restore 15_Health. Reward: Obelisk's Eye.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: A one-eyed, one stone, towering purple minion healer.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Bazaar Burglary
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Quest: Add 4 cards from other classes to your hand. Reward: Ancient Blades.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Just when you set up your "All-Natural Scented Candles" at the farmer's market and then some STUPID KOBOLD COMES AND TAKES THEM ALL!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Beaming Sidekick
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Sure, I'll carry the water! And the food! And the tents! And the cursed monkey paw!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Brazen Zealot
Saviors of Uldum.text: Whenever you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Some paladins really Light it up.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Corrupt the Waters
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Quest: Play 6 Battlecry cards. Reward: Heart of Vir'naal.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: This is why Hagatha is banned from public pools.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Embalming Ritual
Saviors of Uldum.text: Give a minion Reborn.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Guess what! We're getting a new cat."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Hack the System
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Quest: Attack 5 times with your hero. Reward: Anraphet's Core.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Anything can be hacked, if you're holding an axe.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Into the Fray
Saviors of Uldum.text: Give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "You are in my FRAY!"

Saviors of Uldum.name: Jar Dealer
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Deathrattle: Add a random 1-Cost minion to your hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: What's in the jar? It could be anyone!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Making Mummies
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Quest: Play 5 Reborn minions. Reward: Emperor Wraps.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "I do say, this gives me the vapors every single time!"

Saviors of Uldum.name: Mogu Cultist
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: If your board is full of Mogu Cultists, sacrifice them all and summon Highkeeper Ra.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Mogu cultists have the worst team-building exercises.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Murmy
Saviors of Uldum.text: Reborn
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Unlike other mummies, they rolled him up with rice, sliced cucumbers, and soy sauce on the side.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Pharaoh Cat
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Add a random Reborn minion to your_hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Mightiest of mousers, enduring in kingship of the upper and lower cat tree, conqueror of the red dot, the all-wise Catshepsut.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Plague of Flames
Saviors of Uldum.text:
[x]Destroy all your minions.
For each one, destroy a
random enemy minion.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: This is fine.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Plague of Madness
Saviors of Uldum.text: Each player equips a 2/2 Knife with Poisonous.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Don't bring a candle to a knife fight.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Raid the Sky Temple
Saviors of Uldum.text: Quest: Cast 10 spells. Reward: Ascendant Scroll.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Why can't I hold all these scrolls?"

Saviors of Uldum.name: Sinister Deal
Saviors of Uldum.text: Discover a Lackey.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor:
"So, what's in the sack?" 
"Something... sinister." 
"Okay, it's a deal."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Supreme Archaeology
Saviors of Uldum.text: Quest: Draw 20 cards. Reward: Tome of Origination.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Archaeology is the discovery of rare and powerful artifacts. Supreme Archaeology is TAKING THEM!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Unseal the Vault
Saviors of Uldum.text: Quest: Summon 20_minions. Reward: Pharaoh's Warmask.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Huh... That's a nice card back."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Untapped Potential
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Quest: End 4 turns with any unspent Mana. Reward: Ossirian Tear.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The official term is "strategic laziness."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Worthy Expedition
Saviors of Uldum.text: Discover a Choose One card.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: This isn't where I parked my mount.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Ancient Mysteries
Saviors of Uldum.text: Draw a Secret from your deck. It costs (0).
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: I'm not saying it was aliens, but it was TOTALLY aliens!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Arcane Flakmage
Saviors of Uldum.text: After you play a Secret, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Ancient pandaren proverb: He who is without secrets lacks flak.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Bug Collector
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Locust with Rush.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The only one who likes BEEEES!!!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Clever Disguise
Saviors of Uldum.text: Add 2 random spells from another class to_your hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "It me! Togwaggle!"

Saviors of Uldum.name: Crystal Merchant
Saviors of Uldum.text: If you have any unspent Mana at the end of your turn, draw a card.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: I won't ask about your mana curve if you don't ask where I got these.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Dwarven Archaeologist
Saviors of Uldum.text: After you Discover a card, reduce its cost by (1).
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: She's making great progress on paying off that advanced degree.

Saviors of Uldum.name: EVIL Totem
Saviors of Uldum.text: At the end of your turn, add a Lackey to your hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: A lot of people blame the parents when a totem goes bad.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Expired Merchant
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: Discard your highest Cost card. Deathrattle: Add 2 copies of it to your hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The "best by" date is more like a guideline.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Fishflinger
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Add a random Murloc to each player's_hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The scent of fish lingers on the fishflinger's fish fingers.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Frightened Flunky
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Taunt_minion.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Some people just aren't cut out to be supervillain material.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Grandmummy
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Reborn Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: A grandmummy’s love is eternal.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Holy Ripple
Saviors of Uldum.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemies. Restore #1_Health to all friendly characters.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: I still prefer the taste of banana fudge ripple.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Injured Tol'vir
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Me-OW!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Kobold Sandtrooper
Saviors of Uldum.text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to the enemy_hero.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Stay while, take candle.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Micro Mummy
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The dramatically detailed terrifically trimmed replica of the real thing!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Neferset Ritualist
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Restore adjacent minions to full_Health.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The Neferset are great—they'll always make sure their friends are feline fine.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Penance
Saviors of Uldum.text: Lifesteal Deal $3 damage to a_minion.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: This is what happens when you don’t give a sincere apology.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Pressure Plate
Saviors of Uldum.text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, destroy a random enemy_minion.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The appropriate dishware for stressful situations.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Questing Explorer
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: If you control a Quest, draw a card.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Earned her merit badges the hard way—twelve zhevra hooves at a time.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Quicksand Elemental
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack this_turn.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Use a light abrasive to buff blemishes away but use a heavy abrasive to debuff problems.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Sandstorm Elemental
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Doot doot doot doot doot [Pause] Doot doot doot doot doot DEE doot doot doot doot doot!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Sandwasp Queen
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Add two 2/1 Sandwasps to your hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor:
Oooh, see that wasp! 
Watch that sting! 
Dig in the Sandwasp Queen!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Serpent Egg
Saviors of Uldum.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Sea Serpent.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: These things go from "adorable danger noodle!" to "MY FACE IS MELTING!" all too quickly.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Sir Finley of the Sands
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, Discover an upgraded Hero Power.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "The sands shall be my sea! And this scarab shall be my, er, strange and wriggly boat!"

Saviors of Uldum.name: Spitting Camel
Saviors of Uldum.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
__deal 1 damage to another__
random friendly minion.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Were you expectorating another bad pun?

Saviors of Uldum.name: Subdue
Saviors of Uldum.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Like humility but more humiliating.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Temple Berserker
Saviors of Uldum.text: Reborn Has +2 Attack while damaged.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: He's back. He's angry. And he's here to wrap things up.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Vilefiend
Saviors of Uldum.text: Lifesteal
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Dreamed of becoming a Stylefiend, but fel was never in season.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Whirlkick Master
Saviors of Uldum.text: Whenever you play a Combo card, add a random Combo card to your hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: C-c-combo!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Zephrys the Great
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, wish for the perfect card.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Of course it's perfect, you're just not seeing how to use it."

Saviors of Uldum.name: BEEEES!!!
Saviors of Uldum.text:
[x]Choose a minion.
Summon four 1/1 Bees
that attack it.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Right before CEEEES!!!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Bloodsworn Mercenary
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a damaged friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: You look really hurt. You could use a friend!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Candletaker
Saviors of Uldum.text: Reborn
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "You no waaaake caaaandle!"

Saviors of Uldum.name: Desert Hare
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Desert Hares.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: After they're caught, they’re dessert hares.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Desert Spear
Saviors of Uldum.text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Locust with Rush.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Goes on the right, next to the desert spoon.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Dune Sculptor
Saviors of Uldum.text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
add a random Mage
minion to your hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Come for the magic show, stay for the sand castles.

Saviors of Uldum.name: EVIL Recruiter
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Lackey to summon a 5/5 Demon.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: I'm starting to think the lackeys aren't evil, just taken advantage of.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Flame Ward
Saviors of Uldum.text: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, deal $3 damage to all enemy minions.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Not to be confused with the burn ward.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Generous Mummy
Saviors of Uldum.text: Reborn Your opponent's cards cost (1) less.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Yeah, she's mummified, but her money hasn’t dried up!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Golden Scarab
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Discover a 4-Cost card.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Who actually puts all the gold plating on these things, and why?

Saviors of Uldum.name: History Buff
Saviors of Uldum.text: Whenever you play a minion, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Actually... what happened was...

Saviors of Uldum.name: Hooked Scimitar
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Combo: Gain +2 Attack.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Oooooooooooow. I'm hooked on a scimitar!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Hunter's Pack
Saviors of Uldum.text: Add a random Hunter Beast, Secret, and weapon to your_hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Oh look! It's a trap!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Infested Goblin
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Scarabs with Taunt to your hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Trust us. DON'T go cheap on the scarab repellent.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Livewire Lance
Saviors of Uldum.text: After your Hero attacks, add a Lackey to your_hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The lance is heavy but it’s the battery pack that really does a number on the shoulders.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Mischief Maker
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Swap the top card of your deck with your_opponent's.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Fair trade is for noble-minded suckers with dignity and honor.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Neferset Thrasher
Saviors of Uldum.text: Whenever this attacks, deal 3 damage to your_hero.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Tough to do skateboard tricks with four legs.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Plague of Murlocs
Saviors of Uldum.text: Transform all minions into random Murlocs.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: This is horrible! And adorable!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Ramkahen Wildtamer
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Copy a random Beast in your hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: She gets to decide what cards go to the Hall of Fame.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Salhet's Pride
Saviors of Uldum.text: Deathrattle: Draw two 1-Health minions from your_deck.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Pride cometh before the maul.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Vulpera Scoundrel
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell or pick a mystery choice.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: A spell is a spell, but the mystery choice could be anything! (It's also a spell.)

Saviors of Uldum.name: Weaponized Wasp
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: If you control a Lackey, deal 3_damage.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Dr. Boom had one simple request: wasps with flippin' laser beams attached to their heads.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Wretched Reclaimer
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion, then return it to life with full Health.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Ok, here's the plan. We kill you, then bring you back." "Stronger?" "No, about the same."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Ancestral Guardian
Saviors of Uldum.text: Lifesteal Reborn
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: No one knows whose ancestor he is, but he's still upset that you never call.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Body Wrapper
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Shuffle it into your deck.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: She uses pickle slices for the eyes. Keeps them well-preserved.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Bone Wraith
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt Reborn
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: It uses only the eco-friendly bones from free-range humanoids.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Conjured Mirage
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt At the start of your turn, shuffle this minion into your deck.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: What you see is Isiset.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Diseased Vulture
Saviors of Uldum.text:
Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, summon a random
3-Cost minion.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: He's off the twig! He's kicked the bucket! THIS IS AN EX-VULTURE!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Garden Gnome
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, summon two 2/2 Treants.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Greetings, my little shrubs... It's whittlin' time."

Saviors of Uldum.name: High Priest Amet
Saviors of Uldum.text:
[x]Whenever you summon a
minion, set its Health equal
to this minion's.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: All minions are equal, but some minions are more equal than others.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Hyena Alpha
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Everything the sun touches is ours—so long as it's already dead.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Impbalming
Saviors of Uldum.text: Destroy a minion. Shuffle 3 Worthless Imps into your deck.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: With your complexion, Imp Balm is a great demonizer.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Psychopomp
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game. Give it Reborn.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Come with me if you want to re-live."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Restless Mummy
Saviors of Uldum.text: Rush Reborn
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Life-separation anxiety syndrome.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Sahket Sapper
Saviors of Uldum.text: Deathrattle: Return a _random enemy minion to_ your_opponent's_hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Here, you dropped this."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Shadow of Death
Saviors of Uldum.text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 'Shadows' into your deck that summon a copy when drawn.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Making new friends takes skill.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Splitting Axe
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Summon copies of your Totems.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The ancient shaman chant, "Control Axe, Control Vee."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Sunstruck Henchman
Saviors of Uldum.text: At the start of your turn, this has a 50% chance to_fall asleep.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: There is E.V.I.L. here that DOES sleep.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Vessina
Saviors of Uldum.text: While you're Overloaded, your other minions have +2 Attack.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: She wasn't happy when Hagatha sent her back to Uldum. But her "angry" hiss sounds like her "happy" hiss, so no one knew the difference.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Anka, the Buried
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Change each Deathrattle minion in your hand into a 1/1 that costs (1).
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "You look familiar. Were you at my first funeral?"

Saviors of Uldum.name: Anubisath Defender
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt. Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Also comes running when he hears a can opener.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Bazaar Mugger
Saviors of Uldum.text: Rush Battlecry: Add a random minion from another class to your hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Premium muggings at a discount price.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Cloud Prince
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 6 damage.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "In West Cloudidelphia, born and raised; flinging lightning for the rest of my days."

Saviors of Uldum.name: Dark Pharaoh Tekahn
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Lackeys are 4/4.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: He'll get that League of Explorers and their little murloc too!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Desert Obelisk
Saviors of Uldum.text:
[x]If you control 3 of these
at the end of your turn,
deal 5 damage to a
random enemy.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The Obelisk of the Stars can hide an entire land from prying eyes! Or zap a rando.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Elise the Enlightened
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, duplicate your hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: From cartographer to combatant, Elise has taken the road less traveled—because no one else could find it on a map.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Faceless Lurker
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt Battlecry: Double this minion's Health.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Longtime lurker, first time attacker.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Mortuary Machine
Saviors of Uldum.text: After your opponent plays a minion, give it Reborn.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The ankle bone's connected to the shin bone. The knuckle bone's connected to the... eh, it'll be fine.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Naga Sand Witch
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: Change the Cost of spells in your hand to (5).
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: 5 mana footlong, anyone?

Saviors of Uldum.name: Oasis Surger
Saviors of Uldum.text: Rush Choose One - Gain +2/+2; or Summon a copy of this minion.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Surge's up, dude!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Phalanx Commander
Saviors of Uldum.text: Your Taunt minions have +2 Attack.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Turns out he's really good at herding cats.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Plague of Wrath
Saviors of Uldum.text: Destroy all damaged minions.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Thanks, I HATE it!"

Saviors of Uldum.name: Sandhoof Waterbearer
Saviors of Uldum.text: At the end of your turn, restore #5 Health to a damaged friendly character.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Used to carrying for his team.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Wasteland Assassin
Saviors of Uldum.text: Stealth Reborn
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: They'll never see me coming, what with my glowing body, eyes and daggers.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Armagedillo
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: We may never know what provoked it, but we will never forget the consequences.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Armored Goon
Saviors of Uldum.text: Whenever your hero attacks, gain 5 Armor.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Armored except for non-critical areas, such as the head, torso, fists and thighs.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Blatant Decoy
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Deathrattle: Each player summons the lowest Cost minion from their hand.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "Hah! You is being tricked by ME! Togwaggle!"

Saviors of Uldum.name: Hidden Oasis
Saviors of Uldum.text: Choose One - Summon a 6/6 Ancient with Taunt; or Restore #12 Health.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Amazing that it's been hidden, given the twenty-foot treant splashing around in it.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Khartut Defender
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Taunt, Reborn Deathrattle: Restore #3 Health to your hero.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Gesundheit!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Pharaoh's Blessing
Saviors of Uldum.text: Give a minion +4/+4, Divine Shield, and Taunt.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Life hack: Sneeze near a pharaoh.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Reno the Relicologist
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: All his life, Reno Jackson was only a gatling wand away from becoming the greatest and most terrifying mage who ever existed.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Riftcleaver
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Your hero takes damage equal to its Health.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Brings you face to face with your destructive impulses.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Scarlet Webweaver
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random Beast in your_hand by (5).
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Isn't that nice? The spider made the explorer a sleeping bag!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Swarm of Locusts
Saviors of Uldum.text: Summon seven 1/1 Locusts with Rush.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Good things never come in swarms.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Wild Bloodstinger
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Summon a minion from your opponent's hand. Attack it.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Tame Bloodstingers would politely invite your minion to tea.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Dinotamer Brann
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon King Krush.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Brann's new dino-taming hobby is going well—his pet can already make him sit, stand, and roll over!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Earthquake
Saviors of Uldum.text: Deal $5 damage to all minions, then deal $2 damage to all minions.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Shake it, sh-sh-sh-shake it like a Kalimdor fissure.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Overflow
Saviors of Uldum.text:
Restore #5 Health
to all characters.
Draw 5 cards.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: It's a high five followed by a low tide.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Siamat
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush, Taunt, Divine Shield, or Windfury (your choice).
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: TAUNT. TAUNT.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Wasteland Scorpid
Saviors of Uldum.text: Poisonous
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: After they get to a certain size, it doesn't matter if they're poisonous or not.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Wrapped Golem
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: The end result of one of the greatest wrap battles of all time.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Octosari
Saviors of Uldum.text: Deathrattle: Draw 8 cards.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Eight arms of sand-flinging, foe-wringing, card-slinging fury!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Pit Crocolisk
Saviors of Uldum.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: PIT! Not PET!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Tip the Scales
Saviors of Uldum.text: Summon 7 Murlocs from your deck.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Hold on, I need to get some murlocs to weigh in on this.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Tomb Warden
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Also known as an ancient copy machine.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Tortollan Pilgrim
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell in your deck and cast it with random targets.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: A tortollan made it to the desert!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Anubisath Warbringer
Saviors of Uldum.text: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +3/+3.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Some dogs will bring you a bone or a squeaky toy. This one brings war!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Mogu Fleshshaper
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Rush. Costs (1) less for each minion on the battlefield.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: He's here to shape *clap* you up!

Saviors of Uldum.name: Plague of Death
Saviors of Uldum.text: Silence and destroy all_minions.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Don't worry, there's a happy little funhouse right under that sand pit.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Colossus of the Moon
Saviors of Uldum.text: Divine Shield Reborn
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: Strike him down, and you'll face the Colossus of the New Moon.

Saviors of Uldum.name: King Phaoris
Saviors of Uldum.text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: When you're the king of the cats, the whole desert is your litterbox.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Living Monument
Saviors of Uldum.text: Taunt
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: This is not the greatest card in the world. This is just a monument.

Saviors of Uldum.name: Puzzle Box of Yogg-Saron
Saviors of Uldum.text: Cast 10 random spells (targets chosen randomly).
Saviors of Uldum.flavor: "PUT THE BOX DOWN, RENO!"

Descent of Dragons.name: Embiggen
Descent of Dragons.text: Give all minions in your deck +2/+2. They cost (1) more (up to 10).
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Did you set it to "wumbo?"

Descent of Dragons.name: Whispers of EVIL
Descent of Dragons.text: Add a Lackey to your_hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Madame Lazul’s ASMR program is off to a promising start!

Descent of Dragons.name: Arcane Breath
Descent of Dragons.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: One of many side effects from eating mana cookies.

Descent of Dragons.name: Blazing Battlemage
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Weaponized an ancient technique once used to slice cold butter.

Descent of Dragons.name: Bloodsail Flybooter
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Pirates to your hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: They’re pretty fly for some pirate guys.

Descent of Dragons.name: Clear the Way
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Sidequest: Summon 3 Rush minions. Reward: Summon a 4/4 Gryphon with Rush.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: The terrifying part is the gryphons' squeaky voices afterward.

Descent of Dragons.name: Depth Charge
Descent of Dragons.text: At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to ALL_minions.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: * Does not have Charge.

Descent of Dragons.name: Disciple of Galakrond
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Raising Galakrond will cause thurible, thurible damage.

Descent of Dragons.name: Dragon's Hoard
Descent of Dragons.text: Discover a Legendary_minion from another class.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: The Alliance loves this hoard.

Descent of Dragons.name: Dwarven Sharpshooter
Descent of Dragons.text: Your Hero Power can target_minions.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Scissors, knives, needles, you name it! He'll shoot it.

Descent of Dragons.name: Elemental Allies
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Sidequest: Play an Elemental 2 turns in a row. Reward: Draw 3 spells from your deck.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Reno’s lucky he wasn’t caught by a fire elemental.

Descent of Dragons.name: Hot Air Balloon
Descent of Dragons.text: At the start of your turn, gain +1 Health.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: The Gadgetzan Pilgrim's Bounty parade is missing a float this year.

Descent of Dragons.name: Invocation of Frost
Descent of Dragons.text: Freeze an enemy. Invoke Galakrond.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Galakrond adores a little frosting.

Descent of Dragons.name: Learn Draconic
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Sidequest: Spend 8 Mana on spells. Reward: Summon a 6/6 Dragon.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Upon taking up the spellbook, Reno realized with a start: "I can't read."

Descent of Dragons.name: Praise Galakrond!
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Give a minion +1 Attack. Invoke Galakrond.
Descent of Dragons.flavor:
"Turn to Galakrond, Chapter 3 Verse 12.

'SNARL! ROAR! GRAAAAGH!'

Let us reflect on this wisdom."

Descent of Dragons.name: Rain of Fire
Descent of Dragons.text: Deal $1 damage to all_characters.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: You know it’s autumn when the skies rain brimstone and fire. Also: pumpkin spice!

Descent of Dragons.name: Righteous Cause
Descent of Dragons.text: Sidequest: Summon 5 minions. Reward: Give your minions +1/+1.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "And I hereby dub thee a cadet of the Explorer’s League! NEXT!"

Descent of Dragons.name: Sand Breath
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Give a minion +1/+2. Give it Divine Shield if you're holding a Dragon.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: After Uldum, EVERYONE had sand breath.

Descent of Dragons.name: Secure the Deck
Descent of Dragons.text: Sidequest: Attack twice with your hero. Reward: Add 3 'Claw' spells to your hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "Tied it down, boss. I don't really know why you asked me to do that."

Descent of Dragons.name: Sky Raider
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Add a random Pirate to your hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Maybe he should've hatched a plan that could actually carry booty back too.

Descent of Dragons.name: Storm's Wrath
Descent of Dragons.text: Give your minions +1/+1. Overload: (1)
Descent of Dragons.flavor: How many dragons does it take to destroy a hot air balloon? One, two, three, CRUNCH!

Descent of Dragons.name: Strength in Numbers
Descent of Dragons.text: Sidequest: Spend 10 Mana on minions. Reward: Summon a minion from your deck.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: One minion, two minions... tree minions!

Descent of Dragons.name: Surging Tempest
Descent of Dragons.text: Has +1 Attack while you_have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "Overloaded? Should've gotten a surge protector."

Descent of Dragons.name: Toxic Reinforcements
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Sidequest: Use your Hero Power three times. Reward: Summon three 2/1 Leper Gnomes.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: In the event of a sudden loss of cabin pressure, a slingshot will be deployed for convenient evacuation.

Descent of Dragons.name: Treenforcements
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Choose One - Give a minion +2 Health and Taunt; or Summon a 2/2 Treant.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Treemendous value!

Descent of Dragons.name: Violet Spellwing
Descent of Dragons.text: Deathrattle: Add an 'Arcane Missiles' spell to_your hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: A bird in the hand is worth three missiles in the grave.

Descent of Dragons.name: Breath of Dreams
Descent of Dragons.text: Draw a card. If you're holding a Dragon, gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Ysera has the worst morning breath.

Descent of Dragons.name: Corrosive Breath
Descent of Dragons.text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, it also hits
the enemy hero.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: It's a breath of fresh terror!

Descent of Dragons.name: Dragon Breeder
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Dragon. Add a copy of it to_your hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Deathwing would have been more well-adjusted if he'd been raised by this guy.

Descent of Dragons.name: Envoy of Lazul
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one is in your opponent's hand to get a copy of it.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "Note to self: possess someone who's local and knows directions next time."

Descent of Dragons.name: Evasive Chimaera
Descent of Dragons.text: Poisonous Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: One head only tells the truth, while the other head only tells lies. But they both spit poison.

Descent of Dragons.name: Grizzled Wizard
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Swap Hero Powers with your opponent until your next turn.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: When he was young, he was an Outrageous Magus.

Descent of Dragons.name: Nether Breath
Descent of Dragons.text: Deal $2 damage. If you're holding a Dragon, deal $4 damage with Lifesteal instead.
Descent of Dragons.flavor:
"Whether the Nether is cold,
whether the Nether is hot,
we'll burn together,
whatever the Nether,
whether we like it or not."

Descent of Dragons.name: Parachute Brigand
Descent of Dragons.text:
[x]After you play a Pirate,
summon this minion
from your hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: She flies standby.

Descent of Dragons.name: Phase Stalker
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]After you use your Hero Power, cast a Secret from your deck.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: It's not just a phase! I don't have to tell you anything! GAWSH!

Descent of Dragons.name: Ritual Chopper
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Chop chop, Galakrond!

Descent of Dragons.name: Sanctuary
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Sidequest: Take no damage for a turn. Reward: Summon a 3/6 minion with Taunt.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Few quests are completed by cowering under a table.

Descent of Dragons.name: Shrubadier
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2_Treant.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Her shoots can kill.

Descent of Dragons.name: Tasty Flyfish
Descent of Dragons.text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +2/+2.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Reinforced with vitamins and mrglrls.

Descent of Dragons.name: Transmogrifier
Descent of Dragons.text: Whenever you draw a card, transform it into a random Legendary minion.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: All it takes is some imagination and a cardboard box.

Descent of Dragons.name: Wyrmrest Purifier
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all Neutral cards in your deck into random cards from your class.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: She keeps your deck classy.

Descent of Dragons.name: Ancharrr
Descent of Dragons.text: After your hero attacks, draw a Pirate from your_deck.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: The problem with anchors is they often end up sinking to the bottom of your deck.

Descent of Dragons.name: Awaken!
Descent of Dragons.text: Invoke Galakrond. Deal_$1 damage to all_minions.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: This is an alarm clock you can't ignore.

Descent of Dragons.name: Bad Luck Albatross
Descent of Dragons.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle two 1/1 Albatross into your opponent's deck.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Legend holds that it's bad luck to harm it. So maybe just pat it on the head, okay?

Descent of Dragons.name: Blowtorch Saboteur
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's next Hero Power costs (3).
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Before he came along, we went through a lot of duct tape.

Descent of Dragons.name: Breath of the Infinite
Descent of Dragons.text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. If you're holding a Dragon, only damage enemies.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: It's called "circular breathing."

Descent of Dragons.name: Bronze Explorer
Descent of Dragons.text: Lifesteal Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Always ready to explore new friendships! Except with Deathwing.

Descent of Dragons.name: Chenvaala
Descent of Dragons.text: After you cast three spells in a turn, summon a 5/5_Elemental.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Like the Dragon Soul. If dragons had souls of ice.

Descent of Dragons.name: Dark Skies
Descent of Dragons.text:
[x]Deal $1 damage to a
random minion. Repeat
for each card in your hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "It's a drizzle of fire. A fine mist, really."

Descent of Dragons.name: Diving Gryphon
Descent of Dragons.text: Rush Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion_from_your_deck.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Warning: May cause carousel flashbacks.

Descent of Dragons.name: Dragonblight Cultist
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond. Gain +1 Attack for each other friendly minion.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Galakrond would be extra mad if he was resurrected with gnaw marks on his bones.

Descent of Dragons.name: Dragonrider Talritha
Descent of Dragons.text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: You can't just run away from your problems. Unless you have another dragon to jump to.

Descent of Dragons.name: Dread Raven
Descent of Dragons.text: Has +3 Attack for each other Dread Raven you_control.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Fun Fact: A group of three Dread Ravens is an unkindness. Four is lethal!

Descent of Dragons.name: EVIL Quartermaster
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Gain 3 Armor.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: He trained for a whole year to become quarter-master. Three more, and he'll be a full-master.

Descent of Dragons.name: Fiendish Rites
Descent of Dragons.text: Invoke Galakrond. Give your minions +1_Attack.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "You have the right to sacrifice an ally. If you do not have an ally, then one will be sacrificed for you."

Descent of Dragons.name: Fire Hawk
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each card in your opponent's hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: It’s our fault for making all those card backs that look like food.

Descent of Dragons.name: Goboglide Tech
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: If you control a_Mech, gain +1/+1 and_Rush.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: The word "glide" is always in quotes in the manual.

Descent of Dragons.name: Lightning Breath
Descent of Dragons.text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, also damage
its neighbors.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Recipe: One dragon, four wool socks, thick shag carpet.

Descent of Dragons.name: Living Dragonbreath
Descent of Dragons.text: Your minions can't be_Frozen.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: If you want that muscular physique, you've really gotta feel the burn.

Descent of Dragons.name: Mindflayer Kaahrj
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Summon a new copy of it.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: It’s pronounced "Kaahrj."

Descent of Dragons.name: Primordial Explorer
Descent of Dragons.text: Poisonous Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "We're letting the poisonous dude carry the bags?"

Descent of Dragons.name: Ramming Speed
Descent of Dragons.text: Force a minion to attack one of its neighbors.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Her deductible keeps going up.

Descent of Dragons.name: Scalerider
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 2 damage.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Do Re Me Fa So La Spear Throw!

Descent of Dragons.name: Scion of Ruin
Descent of Dragons.text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, summon 2_copies of this.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Ruined! RUINED!

Descent of Dragons.name: Seal Fate
Descent of Dragons.text: Deal $3 damage to an undamaged character. Invoke Galakrond.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Firmly press the seal of your fates instead of leaving the flap open.

Descent of Dragons.name: Sky Claw
Descent of Dragons.text: Your other Mechs have +1 Attack. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Microcopters.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Carefully engineered to never grab the Mimiron plush toy.

Descent of Dragons.name: Skybarge
Descent of Dragons.text:
[x]After you summon a
Pirate, deal 2 damage
to a random enemy.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: It's more of a ship-gun than a gunship.

Descent of Dragons.name: Stormhammer
Descent of Dragons.text: Doesn't lose Durability while you control a_Dragon.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: It brings the storm before the calm.

Descent of Dragons.name: Azure Explorer
Descent of Dragons.text: Spell Damage +2 Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Has an appetite for knowledge!

Descent of Dragons.name: Devoted Maniac
Descent of Dragons.text: Rush Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: There are plenty of apathetic maniacs, but they couldn't be bothered.

Descent of Dragons.name: Dragonbane
Descent of Dragons.text: After you use your Hero Power, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: *Thunk* "That wasn’t a dragon!" *Thunk* "THAT wasn’t a dragon!"

Descent of Dragons.name: Dragonmaw Poacher
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: If your opponent controls a Dragon, gain +4/+4 and Rush.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: I prefer my dragons over-easy.

Descent of Dragons.name: Evasive Feywing
Descent of Dragons.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: I've never heard of this fey-dragon called "Brightwing," but if I HAD, I’d say we’d be best friends.

Descent of Dragons.name: Fate Weaver
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Do not draw the attention of a Fate Weaver, for it will always loom over your destiny.

Descent of Dragons.name: Frizz Kindleroost
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Dragons in your deck by_(2).
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Frizz knows that baby dragons need warmth, care, and the highest possible level of goblin engineering.

Descent of Dragons.name: Grave Rune
Descent of Dragons.text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of this."
Descent of Dragons.flavor: I'm gravely sorry to rune this.

Descent of Dragons.name: Hippogryph
Descent of Dragons.text: Rush Taunt
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Known for its ferocious grace, the hippogryph is a truly majestic creature. Except when molting.

Descent of Dragons.name: Hoard Pillager
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Equip one of your destroyed weapons.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Better to have stabbed and lost. And then found again!

Descent of Dragons.name: Lightforged Zealot
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, equip a __4/2_Truesilver_Champion._
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Card-carrying member of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

Descent of Dragons.name: Molten Breath
Descent of Dragons.text:
[x]Deal $5 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Pizza so hot it burns OTHER PEOPLE’S MOUTHS.

Descent of Dragons.name: Necrium Apothecary
Descent of Dragons.text: Combo: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck and gain its Deathrattle.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Necrium: Get the afterlife without the aftertaste!

Descent of Dragons.name: Nozdormu the Timeless
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Set each player to 10 Mana Crystals.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Time is mana!

Descent of Dragons.name: Squallhunter
Descent of Dragons.text: Spell Damage +2 Overload: (2)
Descent of Dragons.flavor:
"Oh, the weather outside is frightful… But Squallhunter's so delightful!
 
And since we've gone down this road--overload, overload, overload!"

Descent of Dragons.name: Troll Batrider
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "Quiet! The bat can't hear where he's goin'!"

Descent of Dragons.name: Umbral Skulker
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, add 3 Coins to your hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "Three gold?! Do you have any idea how long this quest chain was?"

Descent of Dragons.name: Veiled Worshipper
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, draw 3 cards.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: If you’re not wearing your regulation cultist clothing, how will Galakrond know to devour you last?

Descent of Dragons.name: Wing Commander
Descent of Dragons.text: Has +2 Attack for each Dragon in your hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "Flap! Flap! FLAP!"

Descent of Dragons.name: Zul'Drak Ritualist
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon three random 1-Cost minions for your opponent.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Generosity is a core value in cult culture.

Descent of Dragons.name: Aeroponics
Descent of Dragons.text:
Draw 2 cards.
Costs (2) less for each Treant you control.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Good seeds can go far.

Descent of Dragons.name: Amber Watcher
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Restore #8_Health.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Healing really resin-ates with him.

Descent of Dragons.name: Bandersmosh
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a 5/5 copy of a random Legendary minion.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: The Shudderwock finds him particularly frumious.

Descent of Dragons.name: Big Ol' Whelp
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: A chonker, a real absolute unit.

Descent of Dragons.name: Chromatic Egg
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Secretly Discover a Dragon to hatch into. Deathrattle: Hatch!
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Nefarian was known for creating two things: horrible monsters and excellent breakfasts.

Descent of Dragons.name: Chronobreaker
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: If he asks to borrow your watch, just say no.

Descent of Dragons.name: Cobalt Spellkin
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Add two 1-Cost spells from your class to_your hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Spews more spells than a sleep-talking wizard.

Descent of Dragons.name: Corrupt Elementalist
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond twice.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Her element is "Horns."

Descent of Dragons.name: Crazed Netherwing
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other characters.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Always tail swipes left.

Descent of Dragons.name: Cumulo-Maximus
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: If you have Overloaded Mana Crystals, deal 5 damage.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "Are your clouds not entertained?!"

Descent of Dragons.name: Dragon's Pack
Descent of Dragons.text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. If you've Invoked twice, give them +3/+3.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Each dragon's pack is guaranteed to have at least one rare.

Descent of Dragons.name: Faceless Corruptor
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Transform one of your minions into a copy of this.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: What does Madame Lazul have against faces?!

Descent of Dragons.name: Kobold Stickyfinger
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Steal your opponent's weapon.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: He no take candle. He take sword.

Descent of Dragons.name: Malygos, Aspect of Magic
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover an upgraded Mage spell.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: It's official. We can say Malygeese.

Descent of Dragons.name: Platebreaker
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's Armor.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Worst. Dinner guest. Ever.

Descent of Dragons.name: Rolling Fireball
Descent of Dragons.text:
Deal $8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues to
the left or right.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Why don't they ever run perpendicular?

Descent of Dragons.name: Shield of Galakrond
Descent of Dragons.text: Taunt Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Realistically, she's the shield for Galakrond's big toe.

Descent of Dragons.name: Skyfin
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon 2 random Murlocs.
Descent of Dragons.flavor:
"Do you want to be a murloc or a dragon?" 

"Yes."

Descent of Dragons.name: Stowaway
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: If there are cards in your deck that didn't start there, draw 2 of them.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Cut him a break. Even economy class tickets are pretty expensive these days.

Descent of Dragons.name: Tentacled Menace
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Each player draws a card. Swap their_Costs.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: He calls this one the "Calamari Special."

Descent of Dragons.name: Time Rip
Descent of Dragons.text: Destroy a minion. Invoke Galakrond.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "It's time. R.I.P."

Descent of Dragons.name: Waxadred
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle a Candle into your deck that resummons Waxadred when drawn.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Waxadred the dragon fought for his king, frolicking through the fields melting everything!

Descent of Dragons.name: Abyssal Summoner
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a Demon with Taunt and stats equal to your hand size.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: But gnomes have tiny hands...

Descent of Dragons.name: Camouflaged Dirigible
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs Stealth until your_next turn.
Descent of Dragons.flavor:
"What does that cloud look like to you?" 

"Trouble."

Descent of Dragons.name: Candle Breath
Descent of Dragons.text: Draw 3 cards. Costs (3)_less while you're holding a Dragon.
Descent of Dragons.flavor:
"And Waxadred shall light their fires, with roaring breath hotter than pyres!
 
Come before him, scamp and vandal, pledge your faith and lift your candle!"

Descent of Dragons.name: Dragoncaster
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, your next spell this turn costs (0).
Descent of Dragons.flavor: It’s challenging to perform magic on dragonback. It’s so easy to drop the rabbit.

Descent of Dragons.name: Emerald Explorer
Descent of Dragons.text: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Make it a double dragon!

Descent of Dragons.name: Evasive Wyrm
Descent of Dragons.text: Divine Shield, Rush Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Deftly dodges spells like a real wiggle wyrm.

Descent of Dragons.name: Flik Skyshiv
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a minion and all copies of it (wherever they are).
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Junior explorers scan the night sky in fear of her candle’s flame!

Descent of Dragons.name: Gyrocopter
Descent of Dragons.text: Rush Windfury
Descent of Dragons.flavor: The hula doll is still absolutely required.

Descent of Dragons.name: Kronx Dragonhoof
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw Galakrond. If you're already Galakrond, unleash a Devastation.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: The only one who knows how to properly prepare Galakrond's coffee.

Descent of Dragons.name: Nithogg
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 0/3 Eggs. Next turn they hatch into 4/4 Drakes with Rush.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Not to be confused with Nithogger.

Descent of Dragons.name: Utgarde Grapplesniper
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Both players draw a card. If it's a Dragon, summon it.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Note: The dragon may be a little cranky upon arrival.

Descent of Dragons.name: Veranus
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: As an empty nester, she just misses her little ones.

Descent of Dragons.name: Evasive Drakonid
Descent of Dragons.text: Taunt Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Doesn't respond to spells, hero powers, calls, or text messages.

Descent of Dragons.name: Galakrond, the Nightmare
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1 card. It costs (0). (@)
Descent of Dragons.flavor: The enormous creature unfurled terrifying claws dripping with poisonous ichor. King Togwaggle was pleased, but inwardly disappointed the great Nightmare refused to wear the candle.

Descent of Dragons.name: Galakrond, the Tempest
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 2/2 Storms with Rush. (@)
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Hagatha cried out over the winds: "Truly, you are as powerful as the Maelstrom!" To which the Tempest answered: "I AM THE MAELSTROM."

Descent of Dragons.name: Galakrond, the Unbreakable
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1 minion. Give it +4/+4. (@)
Descent of Dragons.flavor: The ground quaked beneath the behemoth as Dr. Boom continued: "…with over 400 TONS of solid Storm Silver plate." Then he beeped a small remote. "And luxury spikes!"

Descent of Dragons.name: Galakrond, the Unspeakable
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy 1 random enemy minion. (@)
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Lazul called Galakrond’s name, her voice echoed by whispers from the deep. Both of Galakrond’s eyes opened… and then other eyes opened, as well.

Descent of Dragons.name: Galakrond, the Wretched
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon 1 random Demon. (@)
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Fel-flames slowly writhed around the skeleton, until the great bones knit themselves together into a demonic monstrosity. Rafaam shielded his face from the heat but could not hide his grin.

Descent of Dragons.name: Goru the Mightree
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Treants have +1/+1.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: He's untreefeated.

Descent of Dragons.name: Lightforged Crusader
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 5 random Paladin cards to your hand.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Self-appointed president of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

Descent of Dragons.name: Shu'ma
Descent of Dragons.text:
At the end of your turn,
fill your board with 1/1_Tentacles.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: How to tell your mother to go away.

Descent of Dragons.name: Valdris Felgorge
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Increase your maximum hand size to 12. Draw 4 cards.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: I don't mean to pry, but you don't by chance happen to have six fingers on both of your hands?

Descent of Dragons.name: Deathwing, Mad Aspect
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Attack ALL other minions.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Bite that one, bite that other one, claw this one, swallow that one whole....

Descent of Dragons.name: Mana Giant
Descent of Dragons.text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each
card you've played this
game that didn't start
in your deck.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Spell more and save more with a GIANT discount!

Descent of Dragons.name: Murozond the Infinite
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Play all cards your opponent played last_turn.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: "Well, I'm glad YOU knew what I should be doing this turn."

Descent of Dragons.name: Twin Tyrant
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to two random enemy minions.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: They can never agree on whether it's too hot or too cold.

Descent of Dragons.name: Zzeraku the Warped
Descent of Dragons.text:
[x]Whenever your hero
takes damage, summon
a 6/6 Nether Drake.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: The extra Z is for "zesty."

Descent of Dragons.name: Dragonqueen Alexstrasza
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, add 2 other random Dragons to your hand. They cost (0).
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Givin' lives and takin' names.

Descent of Dragons.name: Sathrovarr
Descent of Dragons.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a copy of it to_your hand, deck, and battlefield.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Just wait until you also find a copy in your pocket. And your desk! And your FRIDGE!!

Descent of Dragons.name: Ysera, Unleashed
Descent of Dragons.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 7 Dream Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a random Dragon.
Descent of Dragons.flavor: Releash the Dragon!

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Boom Squad
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Discover a Lackey, Mech, or Dragon.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Discover the meaning of squad goals.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Cleric of Scales
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell from your deck.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: If she can't find a spell, it's a clerical error.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Fiendish Servant
Galakrond's Awakening.text: [x]Deathrattle: Give this minion's Attack to a random friendly minion.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Putting the "r" in fiend.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Risky Skipper
Galakrond's Awakening.text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to all_minions.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Sworn enemy of the Safety Matey.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Air Raid
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Twinspell Summon two 1/1 Silver_Hand Recruits with Taunt.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: It's difficult to get an air raid together. You have to get twenty-five people, and they all want to play a paladin!

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Explosive Evolution
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Transform a minion into a random one that costs (3) more.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Let's give a big hand for goblin experimentation!

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Fresh Scent
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Twinspell Give a Beast +2/+2.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: *Sniff, sniff* Elite troops... *sniff, sniff* ...armed to the teeth and... *sniff, sniff* ...BAAACON!

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Licensed Adventurer
Galakrond's Awakening.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Quest, add a Coin to your hand.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: "Just point me in the vague direction of the things you want smashed, and you got yourself a deal!"

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Rising Winds
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Twinspell Choose One - Draw a card; or Summon a 3/2_Eagle.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Do not talk to me or my chick ever again.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Shotbot
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Reborn
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Impact detected. Assuming hero pose.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Skyvateer
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Stealth Deathrattle: Draw a card.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: When you go without fruits in an airship, you get a nasty case of skyvy.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Steel Beetle
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, gain 5 Armor.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Steel you can trust—fashioned from the husk of an over-sized creepy-crawly.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Twisted Knowledge
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Discover 2 Warlock cards.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: People eat eight spiders in their sleep per year. Centaurs have two rib cages. Dwarves are just counterfeit titans.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Waxmancy
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Discover a Battlecry minion. Reduce its Cost by (2).
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor:
The waxmancer works with flame and form, giving shape to figures warm. 

Some think he's a crazy creeper, but crafting minions is simply cheaper.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Arcane Amplifier
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Your Hero Power deals 2_extra damage.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Not on good terms with warlocks.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Bomb Wrangler
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a_1/1 Boom Bot.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Bomb Wranglers tend to have short fuses and even shorter lifespans.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Chaos Gazer
Galakrond's Awakening.text: [x]Battlecry: Curse a playable card in your opponent's hand. They have 1 turn to play it!
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: No matter the game rules, it's always playing Go Fish.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Chopshop Copter
Galakrond's Awakening.text: After a friendly Mech dies, add a random Mech to your hand.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Invention is the mother of entropy.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Dark Prophecy
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Discover a 2-Cost minion. Summon it and give it +3 Health.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: It's always a dark prophecy with Madame Lazul. Where's my happy, fluffy prophecy?!

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Skydiving Instructor
Galakrond's Awakening.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 1-Cost minion from your deck.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor:
"Is it dangerous?"
 
"For me? Not at all. Now jump!"

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Escaped Manasaber
Galakrond's Awakening.text: [x]Stealth Whenever this attacks, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Captive manasabers don't behave much better--they're always scratching your furniture and coughing up mana balls.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Frenzied Felwing
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Costs (1) less for each damage dealt to your opponent this turn.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Not to be confused with the "friendsy” felwing.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Grand Lackey Erkh
Galakrond's Awakening.text: After you play a Lackey, add a Lackey to your hand.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Esteemed leader of Rafaam's Inhuman Resources department.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Sky Gen'ral Kragg
Galakrond's Awakening.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you've played a Quest this game, summon a 4/2 Parrot with Rush.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: He's gunning for Sky Adm'ral.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: The Fist of Ra-den
Galakrond's Awakening.text: [x]After you cast a spell, summon a Legendary minion of that Cost. Lose 1 Durability.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: The mighty Ra-den was known as the Keeper of Storms. Unfortunately, he could not keep his fist.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Boompistol Bully
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Battlecry: Enemy Battlecry_cards cost (5)_more next turn.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Preventing insults with injuries.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Hailbringer
Galakrond's Awakening.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Ice Shards that Freeze.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Knows every way to greet someone.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Rotnest Drake
Galakrond's Awakening.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a random enemy minion.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Clean your room, or I'm taking your favorite minion away!

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Scalelord
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Battlecry: Give your Murlocs Divine Shield.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: It's about what they have in common, not what makes them different.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Shadow Sculptor
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Combo: Draw a card for each card you've played this turn.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Carving out new territory in the realm of shadow puppetry.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Aeon Reaver
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Battlecry: Deal damage to_a minion equal to its_Attack.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Ripping centuries asunder helps him manage his busy schedule.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Animated Avalanche
Galakrond's Awakening.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon a copy of this.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Always sliding down mountains because it can't stop talking with its hands.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Winged Guardian
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Taunt, Reborn Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: Take these broken wings, be reborn, and learn to fly again.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: Eye of the Storm
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Summon three 5/6 Elementals with Taunt. Overload: (3)
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: If that's the eye, I would hate to see the rest of the storm.

Galakrond's Awakening.name: The Amazing Reno
Galakrond's Awakening.text: Battlecry: Make all minions disappear. *Poof!*
Galakrond's Awakening.flavor: "Reno!" "Please address me by my proper title." " Amazing Reno..."

Ashes of Outland.name: Aldor Attendant
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost_of your Librams by_(1) this game.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Will check to make sure you have a valid libramary card.

Ashes of Outland.name: Blackjack Stunner
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Secret, return a minion to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "I'm about to ruin this 10-cost minion's whole career."

Ashes of Outland.name: Crimson Sigil Runner
Ashes of Outland.text: Outcast: Draw a card.
