Ashes of Outland.flavor: He's not the fastest of the bunch, but he'll take a stab at it anyway.

Ashes of Outland.name: Ethereal Augmerchant
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Spell Damage +1.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: According to him, undamaged minions just spell problems.

Ashes of Outland.name: Evocation
Ashes of Outland.text:
Fill your hand with random Mage spells.
At the end of your turn, discard them.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: You too could be the winner of the national spelling spree!

Ashes of Outland.name: Font of Power
Ashes of Outland.text: Discover a Mage minion. If your deck has no minions, keep all 3.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: It's Comic Sans.

Ashes of Outland.name: Guardian Augmerchant
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Divine Shield.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "What doesn't kill you makes me money!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Helboar
Ashes of Outland.text: Deathrattle: Give a random Beast in your hand +1/+1.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Beasts love Helbacon Strips!

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Gan'arg
Ashes of Outland.text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, equip a 3/2 Axe.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Factory Direct Fiery War Axe. Please allow two turns for delivery.

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Homunculus
Ashes of Outland.text: Dormant for 2 turns. Taunt
Ashes of Outland.flavor: He got a time out for excessive vulgarity.

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Sungill
Ashes of Outland.text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, summon two 1/1 Murlocs.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Imprisoned for ten thousand years! Not because it's a demon. Because of the dancing.

Ashes of Outland.name: Infectious Sporeling
Ashes of Outland.text: After this damages a minion, turn it into an Infectious_Sporeling.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "The best thing about being me—there’s so many 'me's."

Ashes of Outland.name: Reliquary of Souls
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Lifesteal Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Reliquary Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: These three represent Anger, Desire, and Suffering. Much like raid night guild chat.

Ashes of Outland.name: Renew
Ashes of Outland.text: Restore #3 Health. Discover a spell.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: I am rejuvenated, I am renewed, I am my own nightlight!

Ashes of Outland.name: Rocket Augmerchant
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Rush.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Don't worry, this won't hurt me a bit."

Ashes of Outland.name: Shadow Council
Ashes of Outland.text:
Replace your hand
with random Demons.
Give them +2/+2.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Why is everybody in Outland replacing their hands?!

Ashes of Outland.name: Soulbound Ashtongue
Ashes of Outland.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: He claims to be "soulbound," but I just think he's clingy.

Ashes of Outland.name: Spymistress
Ashes of Outland.text: Stealth
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Spies in Outland must blend into the environment. That means hot-pink gear and bright green hair. It’s a weird place.

Ashes of Outland.name: Sword and Board
Ashes of Outland.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Gain 2 Armor.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Stab and Slab. Charge and Targe. Slash and Bash. You get the idea.

Ashes of Outland.name: Unstable Felbolt
Ashes of Outland.text: Deal $3 damage to an enemy minion and a random friendly one.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Warning! Your minions are seated in the splash zone.

Ashes of Outland.name: Ambush
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 2/3 Ambusher with Poisonous.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Clip-clop clip-clop CLIP-CLOP STAB!

Ashes of Outland.name: Apexis Smuggler
Ashes of Outland.text: After you play a Secret, Discover a spell.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "S-secrets? I don't have any! Whoa, look, a spell!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Ashtongue Slayer
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Give a Stealthed minion +3 Attack and Immune this turn.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Her other hand attachments include a corkscrew and a bottle opener.

Ashes of Outland.name: Astromancer Solarian
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Solarian Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Loyal to Kael'thas Sunstrider, this blood elf mage sought arcane power in the Void. Did she find it... or did IT find her?

Ashes of Outland.name: Bamboozle
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, transform it into a random one that costs (3) more.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "WE DO YOU A BAMBOOZLE, HOOMAN!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Bonechewer Brawler
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Taunt Whenever this minion takes _damage, gain +2 Attack.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: When you get this swole, arrows are basically free acupuncture.

Ashes of Outland.name: Corsair Cache
Ashes of Outland.text:
Draw a weapon.
Give it +1/+1.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Where's a corsair's favorite place to hide treasure? Under their deck!

Ashes of Outland.name: Dirty Tricks
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, draw 2 cards.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Ahh sand in my eyes! Also, I'm being stabbed."

Ashes of Outland.name: Dragonmaw Sentinel
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Lifesteal.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: On the side, she's training for the annual Dragonmaw hammer throw tournament.

Ashes of Outland.name: Furious Felfin
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, gain +1 Attack and Rush.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Signature moves include Eye Bream, Feast of Soles, and Metamorphofish.

Ashes of Outland.name: Hand of A'dal
Ashes of Outland.text:
Give a minion +2/+1.
Draw a card.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: When it meets the Hand of Gul'dan, they're SHAKING.

Ashes of Outland.name: Immolation Aura
Ashes of Outland.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions twice.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: If you can't take the heat, stop standing in the fire.

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Felmaw
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, __attack a random enemy.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: It doesn't care who woke it up, someone's getting bitten.

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Scrap Imp
Ashes of Outland.text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: His impish imports imply impressively impetuous impropriety.

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Vilefiend
Ashes of Outland.text: Dormant for 2 turns. Rush
Ashes of Outland.flavor: If you do the time, you gotta make up the time.

Ashes of Outland.name: Ironbark
Ashes of Outland.text: Give a minion +1/+3 and Taunt. Costs (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "The important thing, son, is to protect your spores! I have spoken!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Kanrethad Ebonlocke
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Your Demons cost (1) less. Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kanrethad Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: After Illidan's downfall, Kanrethad formed the Council of the Black Harvest to study Illidan's fel magic. Some say he was... green with envy.

Ashes of Outland.name: Libram of Wisdom
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add a 'Libram of Wisdom' spell to your hand."
Ashes of Outland.flavor: The best wisdom is passed on.

Ashes of Outland.name: Mo'arg Artificer
Ashes of Outland.text: All minions take double damage from spells.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Double-damage. You know the drill.

Ashes of Outland.name: Murgur Murgurgle
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Divine Shield Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Murgurgle Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Murlocs are not native to Outland. When the Sungills arrived, one among them rose to the challenge of this dark world. They call him... Murgurgle. Murgur Murgurgle.

Ashes of Outland.name: Netherwalker
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Discover a Demon.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: You got to Nethercrawl before you can Netherwalk.

Ashes of Outland.name: Pack Tactics
Ashes of Outland.text: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/3 copy.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Just you wait, I’ll go get on my main!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Rustsworn Initiate
Ashes of Outland.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Impcaster with Spell Damage +1.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: The Rusted Legion's training leaves a little to be desired. He hasn't even had a tetanus shot yet!

Ashes of Outland.name: Scavenger's Ingenuity
Ashes of Outland.text:
Draw a Beast.
Give it +3/+3.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "A beast, barely alive. Gentlemen, we can rebuild it! Make it stronger, faster... spikier."

Ashes of Outland.name: Sethekk Veilweaver
Ashes of Outland.text:
[x]After you cast a spell on
a minion, add a Priest
spell to your hand.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: The Sethekk weren't able to survive this long by being wasteful with their power. Or their wacky hats.

Ashes of Outland.name: Shadowjeweler Hanar
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]After you play a Secret, Discover a Secret from a different class.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: What is a shadowjeweler? A miserable little pile of secrets.

Ashes of Outland.name: Spectral Sight
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Draw a card. Outcast: Draw another.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Pick a card, any card! Preferably the left- or right-most card."

Ashes of Outland.name: Starscryer
Ashes of Outland.text: Deathrattle: Draw a spell.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Often grieves with the Starsweeper.

Ashes of Outland.name: Akama
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Stealth Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Akama Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "To many of my people, I am known as a traitor... as Illidan's lapdog. I will remain in the shadows, for now... Actually, maybe I'll just remain in the shadows forever."

Ashes of Outland.name: Apotheosis
Ashes of Outland.text: Give a minion +2/+3 and Lifesteal.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Defined as the absolute pinnacle of existence. Plus Lifesteal.

Ashes of Outland.name: Archspore Msshi'fn
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Msshi'fn Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Brave leader of the Sporeggar. Guided by the philosophy that one should not mssh with matters that are not one's msshiness.

Ashes of Outland.name: Augmented Porcupine
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal this minion's Attack damage randomly split among all enemies.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Pokey-man. Gotta spike 'em all!

Ashes of Outland.name: Bladestorm
Ashes of Outland.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. Repeat until one dies.
Ashes of Outland.flavor:
Dear minions: 

Woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh.

Best regards,
Bladestorm

Ashes of Outland.name: Blistering Rot
Ashes of Outland.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
summon a Rot with stats
equal to this minion's.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Known as 'Fel Gel' to the Illidari, it's excellent protection against harsh Draenic sunshine.

Ashes of Outland.name: Bogbeam
Ashes of Outland.text:
Deal $3 damage to_a minion.
Costs (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.

Ashes of Outland.name: Bogstrok Clacker

Ashes of Outland.name: Bonechewer Raider
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: If there is a damaged minion, gain +1/+1 and Rush.

Ashes of Outland.name: Bulwark of Azzinoth
Ashes of Outland.text:
[x]Whenever your hero would
take damage, this loses
_1 Durability instead.

Ashes of Outland.name: Darkglare
Ashes of Outland.text: After your hero takes damage, refresh a Mana_Crystal.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: He's got a dark glare, but he sees crystal clear!

Ashes of Outland.name: Dragonmaw Overseer

Ashes of Outland.name: Frozen Shadoweaver

Ashes of Outland.name: Fungal Fortunes

Ashes of Outland.name: Greyheart Sage

Ashes of Outland.flavor: "What am I drinking again?"

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Observer

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Satyr

Ashes of Outland.name: Lady Vashj
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Vashj Prime' into your deck.

Ashes of Outland.name: Marshspawn

Ashes of Outland.name: Overconfident Orc

Ashes of Outland.name: Serpentshrine Portal
Ashes of Outland.text: Deal $3 damage. Summon a random 3-Cost minion. Overload: (1)
Ashes of Outland.flavor: This is why you never flush a three-cost minion.

Ashes of Outland.name: Teron Gorefiend
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy all other friendly minions. Deathrattle: Resummon them with +1/+1.

Ashes of Outland.name: Terrorguard Escapee

Ashes of Outland.text:
Give a minion +2/+2.
If it's a Totem, summon a copy of it.

Ashes of Outland.name: Underlight Angling Rod
Ashes of Outland.text: After your Hero attacks, add a random Murloc to your hand.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "I said I wanted the ASHbringer not FISHbringer!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Warmaul Challenger

Ashes of Outland.name: Zixor, Apex Predator

Ashes of Outland.name: Burrowing Scorpid

Ashes of Outland.name: Disguised Wanderer

Ashes of Outland.name: Felfin Navigator

Ashes of Outland.name: Germination

Ashes of Outland.text: Reduce the Cost of spells in your deck by_(1).

Ashes of Outland.name: Kargath Bladefist
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kargath Prime' into your deck.

Ashes of Outland.name: Kayn Sunfury

Ashes of Outland.name: Nightshade Matron

Ashes of Outland.name: Overgrowth

Ashes of Outland.name: Replicat-o-tron

Ashes of Outland.name: Rustsworn Cultist

Ashes of Outland.name: Scrap Shot
Ashes of Outland.text:
Deal $3 damage.
Give a random Beast in_your hand +3/+3.

Ashes of Outland.text: Draw a minion. If you have at least 8 cards in hand, it costs (5) less.

Ashes of Outland.text:
[x]Deal $8 damage to a
minion. Costs (3) less if
you cast a spell last turn.

Ashes of Outland.name: Vivid Spores
Ashes of Outland.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."

Deal $5 damage.

When you play
or discard this,

Ashes of Outland.name: Ysiel Windsinger

Reach down into your lungs. The wind that resides there is your greatest treasure. It provides the gift of song, which is free. 
*But not less than (1)

Ashes of Outland.name: Scrapyard Colossus
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Felcracked Colossus with Taunt.

Scholomance Academy.name: Desk Imp

Scholomance Academy.name: Lightning Bloom

Scholomance Academy.name: Animated Broomstick

Scholomance Academy.name: Athletic Studies

Scholomance Academy.name: Carrion Studies

Scholomance Academy.name: Demonic Studies

[x]Shoot three missiles
at random enemy minions
that transform them into
ones that cost (1) less.

Scholomance Academy.name: Double Jump

Scholomance Academy.name: Felosophy
Scholomance Academy.text: [x]Copy the lowest Cost Demon in your hand. Outcast: Give both +1/+1.

Scholomance Academy.name: Frazzled Freshman
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Late to bed, early to rise, makes a student unable to open her eyes."

Scholomance Academy.name: Intrepid Initiate
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Gain +2_Attack.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: How you like them apples?

Scholomance Academy.name: Lab Partner
Scholomance Academy.text: Spell Damage +1
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Professor, a gnome burned my homework!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Nature Studies
Scholomance Academy.text: Discover a spell. Your next one costs (1) less.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "I have a first edition! Go ahead, count the rings."

Scholomance Academy.name: Overwhelm
Scholomance Academy.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Deal one more damage for each Beast you control.

Scholomance Academy.name: Primordial Studies
Scholomance Academy.text: Discover a Spell Damage minion. Your next one costs (1) less.

Scholomance Academy.name: Shield of Honor

Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Sir, this shield would've been more helpful last turn!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Sphere of Sapience

[x]At the start of your turn,
look at your top card. You
can put it on the bottom
_and lose 1 Durability.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: This is what it sounds like when spheres scry.

Scholomance Academy.name: Spirit Jailer

Scholomance Academy.name: Tour Guide
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Here is the original blueprint for the Academy grounds! Don't mind those so-called dark chambers… They'll be at the end of the tour."

Scholomance Academy.name: Trueaim Crescent
Scholomance Academy.text: After your Hero attacks a minion, your minions attack it too.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: You could have just pointed.

Scholomance Academy.name: Wand Thief

Scholomance Academy.flavor: "What’re ya buyin’?”

Scholomance Academy.name: Wave of Apathy

Scholomance Academy.name: Wolpertinger
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.

Scholomance Academy.name: Argent Braggart

Scholomance Academy.name: Boneweb Egg

Scholomance Academy.name: Cram Session

Scholomance Academy.name: Cult Neophyte
Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more next_turn.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: Make a new recruit's deficiencies your efficiencies.

Scholomance Academy.name: Diligent Notetaker

Scholomance Academy.name: Gibberling
Scholomance Academy.text: Spellburst: Summon a Gibberling.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: "As a Linguistics student I have studied the Gibberlings. I have determined they are speaking Gibberish."

Scholomance Academy.name: In Formation!

Scholomance Academy.flavor: Copying is just using your resources wisely.

Scholomance Academy.name: Power Word: Feast

Scholomance Academy.name: Rune Dagger

Scholomance Academy.name: Sneaky Delinquent

Scholomance Academy.flavor: All right, now open your lid and say "Ahh!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Soul Shear
Scholomance Academy.text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
minion. Shuffle 2 Soul
Fragments into your deck.

Scholomance Academy.name: Transfer Student
Scholomance Academy.text: This has different effects based on which game board you're on.
Scholomance Academy.flavor:
Oh, the places you'll go!
There is so much to fight!
There are boards to be explored.
There are dreams to take flight.
Scholomance Academy.howToGet: Earnable after opening a Scholomance Academy card pack.
Scholomance Academy.howToGetGold: Solve the mystery of Transfer Student's origins.

Scholomance Academy.name: Trick Totem
Scholomance Academy.text: At the end of your turn, cast a random spell that costs (3) or less.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: It knows how to sit still and do tricks. Still working on rolling over, though.

Scholomance Academy.text: Battlecry: Add a 1-Cost spell from your class to_your hand.

Scholomance Academy.name: Ace Hunter Kreen
Scholomance Academy.text: Your other characters are Immune while attacking.
Scholomance Academy.flavor: This grandmaster marksman loves winning tournaments and eating a bit of ice cream.

Scholomance Academy.name: Bloated Python

Scholomance Academy.name: Coerce

Scholomance Academy.flavor: "Give me your lunch money, or the sandwich gets it!"

Scholomance Academy.name: Combustion

[x]Deal $4 damage to
a minion. Any excess
damages both neighbors.

Scholomance Academy.name: Instructor Fireheart

Scholomance Academy.name: Molten Blast

Scholomance Academy.flavor: Warning: Robes of Protection are intended for targeted effects only and are not an effective defense against Flamestrike, Twisting Nether, or other AOE attacks.

Scholomance Academy.name: School Spirits
Scholomance Academy.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to all
minions. Shuffle 2 Soul
Fragments into your deck.

Scholomance Academy.name: Self-Sharpening Sword

Scholomance Academy.name: Shadowlight Scholar

[x]After you play a minion,
destroy it and summon a

Costs (1) less per Attack

Also damages the minions next to whomever

[x]Whenever your opponent
_draws a card, add a copy to_

[x]At the end of your turn,
steal 1 Attack and Health

summon tokens and make 'em broken.

[x]After you play the left-
or right-most card in your
hand, deal 1 damage

Give me an R! 
Give me a U!

Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, transform an enemy minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Honestly, the frog did nothing wrong.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Mor'shan Elite
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, summon a copy of this.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "Fear not the orc who has slain a million training dummies, but the orc who keeps CAMPING MY CORPSE!"

Forged in the Barrens.name: Neeru Fireblade
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, open a portal that fills your board with 3/2 Imps each turn.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Look at this guy! He’s obviously evil! OBVIOUSLY!!!

Forged in the Barrens.name: Priest of An'she
Forged in the Barrens.text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, gain +3/+3.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "An’she?" "Bless you!" "No, you, An'she…" "Bless you again!"

Forged in the Barrens.name: Razormane Raider
Forged in the Barrens.text: Frenzy: Attack a random enemy.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "Call me hedgehog one more time. I dare you."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Refreshing Spring Water
Forged in the Barrens.text:
Draw 2 cards.
Refresh 2 Mana Crystals for each spell drawn.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "Mana" is just another name for "electrolytes."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Shadow Hunter Vol'jin
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Swap it with a random one in its owner's hand.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: You wouldn’t see this swap-meet on the Zandalari Roadshow.
Forged in the Barrens.howToGet: Unlocked when opening a Forged in the Barrens pack.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Stonemaul Anchorman
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Rush Frenzy: Draw a card.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "Brug will read anything you put on the parchment prompter. Anything."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Barrens Scavenger
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) while your deck has 10 or fewer cards.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: When the hundredth centaur dropped, so did her bracers.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Floecaster
Forged in the Barrens.text: Costs (2) less for each Frozen enemy.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: His real name is Melvin, but he prefers his friends call him ... <sigh> ..."Floecaster."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Kresh, Lord of Turtling
Forged in the Barrens.text: Frenzy: Gain 8 Armor. Deathrattle: Equip a 2/5 Turtle Spike.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Never should have flushed him.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Lady Anacondra
Forged in the Barrens.text:
Your Nature spells
cost (2) less.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Do you think she got her name before or after she turned into a snake?

Forged in the Barrens.name: Lightshower Elemental
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Restore #8 Health to all friendly characters.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: The forecast calls for light showers, but you won’t need an umbrella.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Taurajo Brave
Forged in the Barrens.text: Frenzy: Destroy a random enemy minion.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "He's brave, but splinters will make any Tauren cry."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Death Speaker Blackthorn
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Deathrattle minions that cost (5) or less from your deck.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: He can speak death but has a hard time reading it.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Druid of the Plains
Forged in the Barrens.text: Rush Frenzy: Transform into a 6/7 Kodo with Taunt.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Not to be confused with the aeronautically advanced Druid of the Planes.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Kargal Battlescar
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Lookout for each Watch Post you've __summoned this game.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: One if by land, two if by tree.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Mutanus the Devourer
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: Eat a minion in your opponent's hand. Gain its stats.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: As long as Naralex stays under the blanket, Mutanus can't get him.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Overlord Saurfang
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: Resurrect 2 friendly Frenzy minions. Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Eats more than his fair share of sour candy.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Party Up!
Forged in the Barrens.text: Summon five 2/2 Adventurers with random bonus effects.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Random? But what if we don't get a tank?

Forged in the Barrens.name: Selfless Sidekick
Forged in the Barrens.text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon from your deck.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: "I got a real sense of humility from her when she bashed that quilboar's head in."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Celestial Alignment
Forged in the Barrens.text: Set your Mana Crystals to 0. Set the Cost of cards in your hand and deck to (1).
Forged in the Barrens.flavor:
"Is my deck any good?"
"I mean, if the stars align."

Forged in the Barrens.name: Deviate Dreadfang
Forged in the Barrens.text: After you cast a Nature spell, summon a 4/2 Viper with Rush.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Even with wings, snakes STILL don't have legs.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Mordresh Fire Eye
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've dealt 10 damage with your Hero Power this game, deal 10 damage to all enemies.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: You're not hardcore unless you died hardcore.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Power Word: Fortitude
Forged in the Barrens.text: Give a minion +3/+5. Costs (1) less for each spell in your hand.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Part of a balanced breakfast.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Primordial Protector
Forged in the Barrens.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw your highest Cost spell. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: I thought the "shape of water" meant something else.

Forged in the Barrens.name: Taintheart Tormenter
Forged in the Barrens.text: Taunt Your opponent's spells cost (2) more.
Forged in the Barrens.flavor: Oh boo hoo, did someone's World Tree burn down?

Legacy.name: Ancestral Healing
Legacy.text: Restore a minion to full Health and give it Taunt.
Legacy.flavor: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

Legacy.name: Backstab
Legacy.text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
Legacy.flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

Legacy.name: Innervate
Legacy.text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
Legacy.flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

Legacy.name: Moonfire
Legacy.flavor: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

Legacy.name: Ritual of Doom
Legacy.text:
Destroy a friendly minion. If you had 5 or more, summon a
5/5 Demon.
Legacy.flavor: "Who wants to sing the Doom song?!"

Legacy.name: Sacrificial Pact
Legacy.text: Destroy a friendly Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
Legacy.flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

Legacy.name: Totemic Might
Legacy.flavor: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

Legacy.name: Arcane Missiles
Legacy.text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Legacy.flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

Legacy.name: Arcane Shot
Legacy.flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

Legacy.name: Blessing of Might
Legacy.flavor: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

Legacy.name: Bloodsail Deckhand
Legacy.text: [x]Battlecry: The next weapon you play costs (1) less.
Legacy.flavor: Piracy is technically a discount.

Legacy.name: Call of the Void
Legacy.text: Add a random Demon to your hand.
Legacy.flavor:
"Marco!"
"Polo!"
"Marco!"
"Who dares summon me?!"
Legacy.howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
Legacy.howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

Legacy.name: Claw
Legacy.text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor.
Legacy.flavor: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

Legacy.name: Corruption
Legacy.text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
Legacy.flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOOM!  Corrupted!

Legacy.name: Crimson Clergy
Legacy.flavor: He won't drop the ball.

Legacy.name: Deadly Poison
Legacy.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

Legacy.name: Elven Archer
Legacy.flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.

Legacy.name: Execute
Legacy.flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

Legacy.name: Focused Will
Legacy.text: Silence a minion, then give it +3 Health.
Legacy.flavor: Extreme focus is almost as effective as a really flashy distraction.

Legacy.name: Frost Shock
Legacy.text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
Legacy.flavor: FROST SHOCK!

Legacy.name: Goldshire Footman
Legacy.flavor: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

Legacy.name: Grimscale Oracle
Legacy.flavor: These are the brainy murlocs.  It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

Legacy.name: Hand of Protection
Legacy.flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

Legacy.name: Holy Smite
Legacy.flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

Legacy.name: Humility
Legacy.flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

Legacy.name: Hunter's Mark
Legacy.flavor: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

Legacy.name: Light's Justice
Legacy.flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

Legacy.name: Mind Vision
Legacy.text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
Legacy.flavor: I see what you did there.

Legacy.name: Mirror Image
Legacy.flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

Legacy.name: Mortal Coil
Legacy.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
Legacy.flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

Legacy.name: Murloc Raider
Legacy.flavor: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

Legacy.name: Pilfer
Legacy.text: Add a random card from another class to_your hand.
Legacy.flavor: The class is always greener on the other side of the board.
Legacy.howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
Legacy.howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

Legacy.name: Power Word: Shield
Legacy.text:
Give a minion +2_Health.
Draw a card.
Legacy.flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

Legacy.name: Psychic Conjurer
Legacy.text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
Legacy.flavor: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

Legacy.name: Radiance
Legacy.flavor: Because you're worth it!

Legacy.name: Reckoning
Legacy.text: Secret: After an enemy minion deals 3 or more damage, destroy it.
Legacy.flavor: He would henceforth be known as "Karmerr, the Doom of Kazzak."

Legacy.name: Scarlet Subjugator
Legacy.text: Battlecry: Give an enemy minion -2 Attack until your_next turn.
Legacy.flavor: At the Scarlet Monastery, he learned the sacred art of kicking people when they're up.
Legacy.howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
Legacy.howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

Legacy.name: Shadowhoof Slayer
Legacy.flavor: Was a humble Elven Archer before Sargeras got to him.

Legacy.name: Sinister Strike
Legacy.flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

Legacy.name: Soulfire
Legacy.flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

Legacy.name: Stonetusk Boar
Legacy.flavor: This card is boaring.

Legacy.name: Timber Wolf
Legacy.flavor: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

Legacy.name: Tome of Intellect
Legacy.text: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
Legacy.flavor: Just a compilation of napkins of intellect.
Legacy.howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
Legacy.howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

Legacy.name: Tracking
Legacy.flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

Legacy.name: Voidwalker
Legacy.flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

Legacy.name: Voodoo Doctor
Legacy.flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

Legacy.name: Whirlwind
Legacy.flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

Legacy.name: Acidic Swamp Ooze
Legacy.flavor: Oozes love Flamenco.  Don't ask.

Legacy.name: Arcane Explosion
Legacy.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
Legacy.flavor: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

Legacy.name: Bloodfen Raptor
Legacy.flavor: "Kill 30 raptors." - Hemet Nesingwary

Legacy.name: Bluegill Warrior
Legacy.flavor: He just wants a hug.   A sloppy... slimy... hug.

Legacy.name: Chaos Strike
Legacy.text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Draw a card.
Legacy.flavor:
"What do we want?" "CHAOS!"
 "When do we want it?"
 "WHEN LEAST EXPECTED!"

Legacy.name: Cleave
Legacy.text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to
two random enemy
minions.
Legacy.flavor: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

Legacy.name: Fan of Knives
Legacy.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw_a card.
Legacy.flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

Legacy.name: Felstalker
Legacy.flavor: This puppy chews up cards instead of shoes.

Legacy.name: Fiery War Axe
Legacy.flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

Legacy.name: Flametongue Totem
Legacy.flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

Legacy.name: Frostbolt
Legacy.text: Deal $3 damage to a_character and Freeze it.
Legacy.flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

Legacy.name: Frostwolf Grunt
Legacy.flavor: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that.   It's more than just a job.

Legacy.name: Heroic Strike
Legacy.flavor: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

Legacy.name: Holy Light
Legacy.flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

Legacy.name: Icicle
Legacy.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it's Frozen, draw a card.
Legacy.flavor: This may appear weak at frost glance, but it's actually a very ice spell.
Legacy.howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
Legacy.howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

Legacy.name: Kobold Geomancer
Legacy.flavor: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

Legacy.name: Kor'vas Bloodthorn
Legacy.text: [x]Charge, Lifesteal After you play a card with Outcast, return this to your hand.
Legacy.flavor: Illidan taught her that demon hunters should sacrifice EVERYTHING… but she still brought Lifesteal just in case.

Legacy.name: Kul Tiran Chaplain
Legacy.flavor: The maritime Kul Tiran clergy are unique among priests for using holy saltwater.
Legacy.howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
Legacy.howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

Legacy.name: Mark of the Wild
Legacy.text: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+3. (+2 Attack/+3 Health)
Legacy.flavor: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

Legacy.name: Murloc Tidehunter
Legacy.flavor: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

Legacy.name: Novice Engineer
Legacy.flavor: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

Legacy.name: Pursuit of Justice
Legacy.text: Give +1 Attack to Silver Hand Recruits you summon this game.
Legacy.flavor: "Is this about justice or just us?"

Legacy.name: River Crocolisk
Legacy.flavor: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

Legacy.name: Rockbiter Weapon
Legacy.text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
Legacy.flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

Legacy.name: Sap
Legacy.text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
Legacy.flavor: Rogues love sappy movies.

Legacy.name: Shadow Word: Death
Legacy.text: Destroy a minion with 5_or more Attack.
Legacy.flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

Legacy.name: Shadow Word: Pain
Legacy.text: Destroy a minion with 3_or less Attack.
Legacy.flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

Legacy.name: Shield Block
Legacy.flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

Legacy.name: Shiv
Legacy.flavor: Rogues are experts at SHIV-al-ry.

Legacy.name: Sightless Watcher
Legacy.text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards in your deck. Choose one to put on top.
Legacy.flavor: What he lacks in sight, he makes up for in sleight-of-tentacle tricks.

Legacy.name: Starving Buzzard
Legacy.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.
Legacy.flavor: If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

Legacy.name: Vanessa VanCleef
Legacy.text: Combo: Add a copy of the last card your opponent played to your hand.
Legacy.flavor: Some people collect stamps or flowers. She collects enemies.

Legacy.name: Windfury
Legacy.flavor: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

Legacy.name: Aldrachi Warblades
Legacy.flavor: The ancient Aldrachi were the greatest warriors in the universe. Imagine their power if they'd put the handle at the END of the blade.

Legacy.name: Animal Companion
Legacy.flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

Legacy.name: Arcane Intellect
Legacy.flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

Legacy.name: Brightwing
Legacy.text: Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your_hand.
Legacy.flavor: Little faerie dragons are made of sugar and spice and maniacal vice.
Legacy.howToGet: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
Legacy.howToGetGold: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

Legacy.name: Charge
Legacy.text: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack and Charge.
Legacy.flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

Legacy.name: Consecration
Legacy.flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

Legacy.name: Coordinated Strike
Legacy.flavor: Undisputed champions of "Dancing with the Satyrs."

Legacy.name: Dalaran Mage
Legacy.flavor: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

Legacy.name: Drain Life
Legacy.text: Deal $2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.
Legacy.flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

Legacy.name: Frost Nova
Legacy.flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

Legacy.name: Hammer of Wrath
Legacy.flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

Legacy.name: Healing Touch
Legacy.flavor: 8 Health, no waiting.

Legacy.name: Hellfire
Legacy.flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

Legacy.name: Hex
Legacy.text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
Legacy.flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

Legacy.name: Holy Nova
Legacy.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
Legacy.flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

Legacy.name: Ironforge Rifleman
Legacy.flavor: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

Legacy.name: Ironfur Grizzly
Legacy.flavor: "Bear Carcass 1/10"

Legacy.name: Kill Command
Legacy.text:
Deal $3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal
$5 damage instead.
Legacy.flavor: "Kill!", he commanded.

Legacy.name: Magma Rager
Legacy.flavor: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

Legacy.name: Raid Leader
Legacy.flavor: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

Legacy.name: Razorfen Hunter
Legacy.flavor: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once.  ONCE.

Legacy.name: Satyr Overseer
Legacy.text: After your hero attacks, summon a 2/2 Satyr.
Legacy.flavor: What he lacks in communication skills, he makes up for with highly responsive staffing allocations.

Legacy.name: Savage Roar
Legacy.flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

Legacy.name: Shadow Bolt
Legacy.flavor: It’s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

Legacy.name: Shattered Sun Cleric
Legacy.flavor: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

Legacy.name: Silverback Patriarch
Legacy.flavor: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

Legacy.name: Soul Cleave
Legacy.text: Lifesteal Deal $2 damage to two random enemy minions.
Legacy.flavor: The way to a demon's soul is through its stomach.

Legacy.name: War Cache
Legacy.text: Add a random Warrior minion, spell, and weapon to your hand.
Legacy.flavor: It's much tidier than Illidan's storage locker.

Legacy.name: Warsong Commander
Legacy.text: Whenever you summon a minion with 3 or less Attack, give it Charge.
Legacy.flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

Legacy.name: Wild Growth
Legacy.flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

Legacy.name: Wolfrider
Legacy.flavor: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

Legacy.name: Assassin's Blade
Legacy.flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

Legacy.name: Assassinate
Legacy.flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

Legacy.name: Blessing of Kings
Legacy.flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

Legacy.name: Chillwind Yeti
Legacy.flavor: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

Legacy.name: Dragonling Mechanic
Legacy.flavor: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

Legacy.name: Fireball
Legacy.flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

Legacy.name: Gnomish Inventor
Legacy.flavor: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

Legacy.name: Houndmaster
Legacy.flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

Legacy.name: Kor'kron Elite
Legacy.flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

Legacy.name: Multi-Shot
Legacy.text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.
Legacy.flavor: You see, it's all about throughput.

Legacy.name: Nordrassil Druid
Legacy.text: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs_(3)_less.
Legacy.flavor: The World Tree Nordrassil provides life-giving energy to the world--and excellent mana savings.

Legacy.name: Oasis Snapjaw
Legacy.flavor: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

Legacy.name: Ogre Magi
Legacy.flavor: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

Legacy.name: Plaguebringer
Legacy.flavor: One sip and you've got the grippe.

Legacy.name: Polymorph
Legacy.text:
Transform a minion
into a 1/1 Sheep.
Legacy.flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

Legacy.name: Power Infusion
Legacy.flavor: It infuses, it enthuses, it amuses!

Legacy.name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
Legacy.flavor: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

Legacy.name: Shadow Word: Ruin
Legacy.text: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
Legacy.flavor: Discovered by a worgen priest after a giant spilled a drink on her new white robes.
